name: CookOff 10.0
description:
In Competitive Coding, logic reigns supreme. Algorithms can be learned, but true brilliance lies in raw, simple logic.

Welcome to CookOff 10.0 – the legendary coding arena of graVITas. For a decade, it has tested skill, speed, and creativity, celebrating problem-solving, where innovation meets determination.

Whether you’re a seasoned coder or a beginner ready to shine, this is your stage. Step into the Colosseum of Creativity, where every line of code takes you closer to victory.

This is more than a contest, it’s a tradition, a legacy. Now, it’s your moment.

Are you ready to code your way to greatness?
short_description: Step into the longest-running competitive coding event at graVITas! CookOff is back with its 10th edition. More than just algorithms and data structures, it’s a test of pure logic, problem-solving, and creativity. Whether you’re a coding veteran or a rising talent, this is your chance to challenge limits, showcase skills, and compete with sharpest minds. Be part of the legacy.
tagline: Learn.Code.Simplify

name: LaserTag
description:
LaserTag is an electrifying 5v5 arena game that puts you and your team in a fast-paced battle to score the most points. Armed with high-tech laser guns, you’ll face off against opponents in a glowing battlefield filled with UV lights, lasers, and vibrant artwork that bring the arena to life. Every corner is designed to heighten the thrill, blending strategy, speed, and accuracy in a truly immersive experience.

The game is completely safe and beginner-friendly, making it perfect for first-timers while still delivering the adrenaline rush that seasoned players crave. With every shot fired and every point earned, the energy builds, keeping you on edge and fully engaged until the last second.

Whether you’re here to compete with friends, test your reflexes, or just enjoy the glow of lasers lighting up the arena, LaserTag guarantees a fun, competitive, and unforgettable adventure. Step inside, gear up, and get ready for a battle that’s as safe as it is exhilarating.
short_description: LaserTag is a thrilling 5v5 arena game where you race to score the most points with laser guns against opponents. Surrounded by glowing UV lights, lasers, and vibrant artwork, the arena creates a fun, competitive vibe. Safe, beginner-friendly, and adrenaline-packed, it’s an experience you won’t forget. Step in, gear up, and let the battle begin!
tagline: ‘The grid never sleeps , the lights never die’

name: Kaun Banega Codepati
description: Kon Banega Codepati (KBC) is a fun-filled coding + quiz event inspired by the iconic KBC format. With quiz rounds, coding challenges, lifelines, and a buzzer finale, it blends knowledge with entertainment. Open to all batches, KBC ensures collaboration, excitement, and rewards, making it one of Gravitas’ most engaging highlights.
short_description: Kon Banega Codepati (KBC) blends quizzes, coding, and buzzer rounds with lifelines, offering fun, collaboration, and excitement across batches.
tagline: Level Sabke Niklenge

name: Capital Hunt
description:
India’s premier student-led startup pitching platform connecting promising student entrepreneurs with
funding agencies
short_description:
Capital Hunt is India's premier student-led startup
pitching platform, connecting discerning investors with
a curated selection of high-potential, early-stage
ventures from across the nation. We provide a firstmover advantage in accessing the next generation of
founders before they enter the mainstream venture
capital landscape.
tagline: From Campus to Capital

name: Social Transformers
description: Discover SOCIAL Transformers, an inspiring event where ideas evolve into enterprises blending social good with profit. Connect with innovators, master life-changing ventures, and help shape a brighter society. Together, let’s craft impactful solutions. Winners receive exclusive mentorship and funding opportunities!
short_description: A two-round student competition—submit solutions via PPT, then pitch live with proof and impact.
tagline: NA

name: Splendera
description:
Splendera is VIT's premier entertainment spectacle, blending technology, art, and creativity into an electrifying experience. Audiences will witness a dazzling laser beam show and immersive laser graphic show, a futuristic TRON dance by a professional crew, an LED wing dance performance by the VIT Dance Club, and a captivating glow-in-the-dark act by the VIT Dramatics Club. This unique convergence of light, rhythm, and imagination promises to deliver a spellbinding showcase like no other.

Slot 1: 11.30AM to 01:00PM (Laser show + Tron Dance+ VIT Drama Club + VIT Dance Club)

Slot 2: 04:00 PM to 05.30PM (Laser show + Tron Dance + VIT Drama Club + VIT Dance Club)
short_description: VIT’s premier entertainment showcase, uniting lasers, dance, and dramatics into an electrifying spectacle. Check description for slot wise performances.
tagline: A Symphony of Light and Motion

name: Cryptic Hunt 4.0
description: VIT’s largest hunt for three years running, Cryptic Hunt 4.0, is back with a new adventure. You will compete in a race against time to scan QR codes hidden throughout the campus, with a live leaderboard tracking your progress. A hunt that’ll test your wit and intelligence, register soon with your team and engage in a high-voltage affair across 36 hours!
short_description: Cryptic Hunt 4.0 is an unconventional tech-based scavenger hunt where teams solve cryptic puzzles by scanning QR codes. Participants explore the campus and decode ciphers and riddles to climb their way up the leaderboard.
tagline: Expect the unexpected!

name: ForkThis
description:
ForkThis is CSI-VIT’s flagship open-source workshop conducted by CSI core members. It focuses on Git and GitHub through theory, demos, and real-life implementation. The event includes an industry expert session on open source. 
 After the workshop, a 2-day online competition will be held featuring bug-fix projects, a live leaderboard, and exciting prize money for the top performers.
short_description: ForkThis is CSI-VIT’s flagship workshop on Git and GitHub, featuring an expert session and a 2-day online competition.
tagline: GIT.SET.FORK

name: BattleCode
description: BattleCode is a fast-paced competitive coding event packed with unique challenges.You’ll take on real opponents in head-to-head battles, race against the clock, and tackle rounds that test both your logic and strategy. Every stage brings a new twist, keeping you on your toes until the very end.
short_description: BattleCode is a fast-paced coding event where you'll face opponents in head-to-head battles. Each stage introduces a new strategic twist, testing your skills until the very end.
tagline: Code. Clash. Conquer. - Outsmart the battlefield, one algorithm at a time!

name: Robowars
description: ROBOWARS is the flagship event of graVITas and one of the biggest combat robotics events in India. More than 40 bots of 8kg, 15kg and 60kg engage in thrilling, round-the-clock battles in the largest and safest arena in the country, competing for the championship title with their war machines. It delivers an adrenaline rush to both participants and the audience. Teams from all over the globe gather here to showcase their fighting spirit and strive for glory.
short_description: Robowars, the flagship event of graVITas, is India’s biggest combat robotics arena. With 8kg, 15kg, and 60kg bots battling for glory, it brings global teams, raw power, and nonstop adrenaline to VIT Vellore.
tagline: Forge . Battle . Wreck - The ultimate combat robotics war at Robowars 2025.

name: நுட்பம் (Nutpam)
description:
PB–TLA brings a unique Tech Meets Tamil experience event for this Gravitas’25. The event consists of No-code Machine Learning workshop where participants explore how AI understands Tamil. Students will train simple models to recognize Tamil alphabets, analyze texts, and classify cultural images, gaining a fun and practical introduction to Artificial Intelligence. 
 The event also continues with a mini-hackathon that challenges students to design Tamil-inspired tech prototypes. Using coding, no-code platforms, and ML tools, teams will create innovative solutions such as Tamil learning apps, cultural chatbots, AI dictionaries, or digital accessibility tools.
short_description:
PB–TLA brings a unique Tech Meets Tamil experience at Gravitas’25.
 The event starts with a No-code ML workshop exploring how AI understands Tamil.
 Students will train models to recognize alphabets, analyze texts, and classify images.
 A mini-hackathon then challenges teams to design Tamil-inspired tech prototypes.
 From learning apps to chatbots and AI tools, innovation meets culture in this event.
tagline: Celebrating Tamil Through Technology

name: HandsOnAI
description: Kickstart your journey into AI & ML with this beginner-friendly workshop covering the fundamentals, tools, and real-world applications from industry experts
short_description: Kickstart your journey into AI & ML with this beginner-friendly workshop covering the fundamentals, tools, and real-world applications from industry experts
tagline: Get your hands good.

name: Juvenile Care Premier League (Internal)
description: The Juvenile Care Premier League (JCPL) is a fun-filled sports initiative by Juvenile Care that brings joy, teamwork, and inclusivity to orphanage children. Through engaging outdoor games, it offers them a platform to play, learn, build confidence, and create lasting memories. JCPL is not just a sports event—it’s a celebration of childhood, care, and community.
short_description: JCPL is a fun outdoor sports event for orphanage children, fostering smiles, teamwork, confidence, and cherished memories.
tagline: Every Child, A Champion — building confidence, teamwork, and memories beyond the game

name: The Great Build-Off: A Race Against the Quake
description: Engineering is more than calculations—it’s about turning ideas into reality! In this event, participants must design and build a structure with limited resources, balancing strength, stability, and creativity. With twists, challenges, and teamwork at its core, every creation will be tested for durability and ingenuity. Only the smartest, strongest, and most innovative design will stand tall!
short_description: A thrilling fusion of quiz and adventure! Solve mind - bending questions, crack hidden clues, and race from one secret location to the next. Only the sharpest minds and fastest feet will uncover the final treasure!
tagline: “Brains on Fire, Feet on the Run!”

name: NoCode Playground
description: NoCode Playground is a one-day, hands-on event where you'll learn to craft stunning, responsive frontend websites with AI. The morning features a guided workshop on designing modern sites without code, while the afternoon is a competitive challenge. You'll build a unique landing page, with the most creative and visually impressive design winning. It's the perfect launchpad for coding newbies and creatives alike.
short_description: A hands-on event to build stunning frontend websites with AI, featuring a guided workshop and a competitive design challenge.
tagline: AI's speed. Pure frontend magic.

name: Stratagem
description: Stratagem 2025 is a hackathon-style case competition where teams solve real-world problems at the intersection of technology, business, and social impact. Participants receive a surprise case, analyze data, develop innovative solutions, and pitch their ideas to an expert judging panel. This immersive event fosters creativity, teamwork, and strategic thinking in a high-pressure environment.
short_description: A hackathon-style case competition where teams tackle real-world challenges through innovation, strategy, and impactful solutions.
tagline: Where strategy meets innovation solving real-world challenges with impact, creativity, and vision

name: AI and ML in Robotics
description: To introduce participants to the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) concepts in Robotics. To provide hands-on experience in using Python libraries with microcontrollers. To demonstrate real-time face recognition control applications using MediaPipe and microcontrollers.
short_description: To introduce participants to the integration of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) concepts in Robotics. To provide hands-on experience in using Python libraries with microcontrollers. To demonstrate real-time face recognition control applications using MediaPipe and microcontrollers.
tagline: Smarter Minds, Smarter Machines

name: Star Party
description:
StarParty is SEDS-VIT’s flagship overnight stargazing event, offering a breathtaking view of the cosmos from the iconic Technology Tower rooftop. Discover planets, constellations, and deep-sky objects through immersive, hands-on sessions led by passionate students. From telescope tutorials to guided sky tours, StarParty brings the universe closer than ever before.
Join us for this annual celestial celebration, a night of wonder, learning, and unforgettable memories under the stars
club: STUDENTS FOR THE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOPMENT OF SPACE (SEDS)
short_description:
Get ready to witness the universe like never before! 
Join SEDS-VIT’s StarParty for a magical night of stargazing on the Technology Tower rooftop. Explore planets, constellations, cosmic wonders and powerful telescopes. Don’t miss this unforgettable experience!
tagline: Join SEDS-VIT’s StarParty for stargazing sessions atop Technology Tower.

name: Bloodlines 2.0
description: Bloodlines 2.0 is SBE-VIT’s thrilling forensic science competition where teams dive into real-world inspired cases. Using DNA analysis, blood typing, and genetic markers, participants race against time to solve puzzles of paternity and ancestry. Combining accuracy, speed, and teamwork, the event challenges competitors to apply scientific methods and uncover the truth.
short_description: Race against time in Bloodlines 2.0: solve ancestry and paternity tests using DNA, blood analysis, and forensic science.
tagline: Legacy, Lies and Fortune

name: Techno Arena
description: Techno Arena — the ultimate fusion of brainpower, teamwork, and fun! This dynamic event zone brings together a series of engaging technical challenges and high-energy non-technical games, offering something for everyone to enjoy and excel at. Whether you’re solving clever puzzles, racing against the clock in logic-based challenges, or diving into entertaining team games that test coordination and creativity.
short_description: Techno Arena blends technical challenges and fun games, fostering creativity, teamwork, learning, and excitement in an engaging, unforgettable arena experience.
tagline: One Arena. One Code. Infinite Loops. Endless Logic, Boundless Minds.

name: Standards CAM-HACK 2.0
description: A 2-day Fusion 360 Hackathon where participants design, model, and prototype real-world solutions using CAD, CAM, simulation, and industry standards. Over 34 hours, teams will collaborate, innovate, and present their creations to judges, blending creativity, engineering, and problem-solving in an exciting design sprint.
short_description: A 2-day Fusion 360 Hackathon where teams design, prototype, and pitch innovative solutions using CAD, CAM, and creativity.
tagline: Design. Simulate. Innovate. Unlock Your Creativity with Hands-On Fusion 360 Mastery!

name: Formula-Aero: Design-a-thon
description: Welcome to Formula-Aero, a high-octane design challenge where innovation meets engineering. This competition challenges participants to concentrate and design the aerodynamics of a Formula style race car. Participants will gain valuable skills in motorsport and mechanical design. A Rs.15,000 prize pool is awarded for the most innovative and effective aerodynamic designs.
short_description: A high-octane design challenge where innovation meets engineering, with a Rs.15,000 prize pool for the best aerodynamic designs.
tagline: Powered by Team Ojas Racing

name: Programming the Future: Experiential Learning in Industrial Robotics for Industry 4.0
description: Discover "Programming the Future: Experiential Learning in Industrial Robotics for Industry 4.0"—a dynamic, hands-on training experience that connects theory to real-world skills in smart manufacturing. Engage directly with FANUC LR Mate and Universal Robots Cobot, mastering intuitive programming, simulation, and modern automation technologies. Explore integration with sensors, vision systems, and automation cells. The course immerses you in Industry 4.0 essentials: IoT connectivity, interoperability, and data-driven innovation. Learn how robotics transforms production while prioritizing safety and collaboration. Perfect for students, engineers, and professionals, this program unlocks the expertise needed to excel in tomorrow’s advanced manufacturing landscape.
short_description: NA
tagline: Programming the Future: Experiential Learning in Industrial Robotics for Industry 4.0

name: Wanna Crack GSOC 2026
description: The event kicks off with a session by a two-time GSOC winner, followed by a team coding challenge where participants use Git to fix bugs in an open-source repository. Teams clone, explore, and assign issues, collaborating to resolve bugs with mentors’ help. The contest ends with submissions via pull requests; winners are judged on quality, best practices, and bug count.
short_description: Teams learn from a GSOC winner, then fix, assign, and submit bug fixes in a repository, judged on quality and best practices.
tagline: Crack the Bugs. Commit the Fix. Conquer the Repo

name: Detective Dilemma
description: The Detective Dilemma event at VIT Vellore is an immersive, 30-minute crime simulation where teams analyze a realistic crime scene, gather physical and verbal clues, interrogate witnesses, and synthesize evidence to identify the culprit, motive, and method, fostering critical thinking, teamwork, and deduction skills in a thrilling, competitive environment.
short_description: A 30-minute crime-solving event at VIT, requiring teams to collect evidence and identify the culprit through teamwork and logic
tagline: Detect, Deduce, Deliver Justice.

name: CosmoLab - Cosmetics Workshop
description: Discover how everyday skincare is born in the lab! In this workshop, participants will not only learn the science behind creams and lip balms but will also formulate their own skincare products using real lab techniques. From selecting ingredients to mixing, testing, and creating personalized formulations, CosmoLab takes you behind the scenes of cosmetic chemistry and shows how science becomes self-care.
short_description: From labs to lotions, in this workshop, participants will not only learn the science behind skin care products like lip balms and lotions but will also formulate their own!
tagline: From Labs to Lotions

name: Operation Antidote: The Final Formula
description: SMV is under siege by a mysterious virus—experience a zombie apocalypse simulation where survivors, engineers, medics, scientists, tacticians, and zombies collaborate or compete through 4 problem-solving rounds. Tackle resource shortage, barricades, plot twists, and emergencies for bonus points. Shape your fate: will teamwork and strategy lead you to the cure or will betrayal turn the tide for the undead?
short_description: The ultimate campus apocalypse simulation combines physical engineering challenges and dramatic role-playing for a tech fest experience unlike any other.
tagline: Race against time to decode chaos and forge the cure before it’s too late.

name: SmowXpress
description: SmowXpress is a fast-paced, hands-on IoT workshop where you build smarter, faster. Using Smowcode, a visual coding language that’s 10x quicker than traditional coding, you’ll prototype real industrial IoT solutions on the ESP32 in just hours. Learn, create, and demo your projects live—whether you’re a beginner or enthusiast, experience the thrill of innovation in one power-packed session.
short_description: SmowXpress: A fast-paced workshop using Smowcode—10x faster coding on ESP32. Build industrial IoT prototypes in hours and demo live.
tagline: TRAVEL WITH SMOWXPRESS

name: Dream Team 7.0
description: Dream Team 7.0 is an immersive IPL auction simulation that puts participants in the role of franchise owners. Teams of friends strategize together to build competitive squads through budgeted bidding, combining the thrill of player auctions with real-world skills such as strategic planning, financial management, and teamwork. Participants must carefully analyze player values, balance team composition, and make tactical decisions to maximize points and performance. The event offers a realistic and engaging environment where cricket knowledge meets business strategy, rewarding both competitive spirit and collaborative thinking. Dream Team 7.0 is not just a game—it’s a test of strategy, leadership, and smart decision-making in the world of cricket management.
short_description: Dream Team 7.0 is a strategic IPL auction simulation where participants collaborate by forming teams with friends to act as franchise owners, building competitive squads through budgeted bidding. This event promotes strategic planning , financial management , and teamwork skills in a realistic and engaging environment.
tagline: Where Champions Are Bought, Not Born!

name: Toycathon - Making of Scientific Toys
description: Group of particpants (2 or 3) will desin diiferent types of toys based Physics concepts with a duration 5 hours.
short_description: NA
tagline: Toycathon- Making of Scientific toys

name: Snakes N Ladders
description: Technical snake and ladders, a person in team will be questioned and if he answered it correctly then he'll get a chance to roll the dice and if his answer is wrong the snake will eat him.
short_description: Snake and ladders with technical questions. A person will get a chance only if they answer the question
tagline: Slide down, climb up, win big!

name: Bridge It
description: Bridge It is a flagship two-day workshop and competition that blends theory with hands-on creativity. Participants learn bridge design basics, then apply them through model-making and load testing. Evaluated on strength, efficiency, and innovation, the event fosters teamwork, problem-solving, and design thinking—offering a unique platform to showcase creativity and build beyond boundaries.
short_description: Bridge It Eklavya is a two-day event where participants explore the fundamentals of bridge design and construction through interactive sessions, practical model-building, and testing challenges that encourage innovation and teamwork.
tagline: Bridge Beyond Boundaries

name: SoapBox Racing
description: Soap Box is your chance to design, build, and race your very own car! Put your technical and mechanical skills into action as you work hands-on with the complete kit we provide. From assembling the chassis to fine-tuning for performance, every step is yours to create. And the best part? You get to take your creation to the track and race it! Whether you’ve dreamed of being a mechanic, an engineer, or a racer, this event gives you the perfect platform to learn, build, and experience the thrill of driving something you made yourself. This will be a 3-day event.
short_description: Soap Box is your chance to design, build, and race your own car! With a complete kit provided, you’ll assemble the chassis, fine-tune for performance, and take your creation to the track. It’s the perfect blend of engineering, mechanics, and racing excitement—all in one hands-on experience. This will be a 3-day event.
tagline: Create, Coast, Conquer

name: Hack the Hackathon
description: Hack-the-Hackathon is IEEE-VIT's signature Gravitas event that shows newcomers exactly how to crush their first hackathon. From brainstorming ideas to building and pitching under pressure, participants learn what it really takes to stand out. The event wraps up with a high-energy ideathon, where teams tackle industry-relevant problem statements, work together to create solutions, and document their approach. The top three teams will walk away with awards for their innovation and execution.
short_description: Hack-the-Hackathon is a workshop, teaching newcomers how to win a hackathon, followed by a ideathon
tagline: Your first hackathon, Hacked!

name: Startup Street X
description: Startup Street X marks the 10th edition of our flagship entrepreneurial marathon, a 24-hour overnight challenge immersing participants in the complete startup journey. Visionary thinkers and innovators brainstorm, validate, strategize, and refine ideas with mentor guidance, culminating in a Shark Tank style pitching round judged on innovation and impact. Networking opportunities and exposure to real-world entrepreneurial challenges make this event a launchpad for future changemakers, offering mentorship, insights, and collaboration potential for all involved .
short_description: A high energy 24 hour overnight ideathon where dynamic teams collaborate to brainstorm, develop, and refine groundbreaking startup ideas. Throughout the challenge, participants receive expert mentorship and work towards pitching their business models to industry leaders, aiming for funding, prizes, and transformative mentorship opportunities that propel innovation and entrepreneurship
tagline: DREAM | BUILD | LEAD

name: Juvenile Care Premier League (External)
description: The Juvenile Care Premier League (JCPL) is a fun-filled sports initiative by Juvenile Care that brings joy, teamwork, and inclusivity to orphanage children. Through engaging outdoor games, it offers them a platform to play, learn, build confidence, and create lasting memories. JCPL is not just a sports event—it’s a celebration of childhood, care, and community.
short_description: JCPL is a fun outdoor sports event for orphanage children, fostering smiles, teamwork, confidence, and cherished memories.
tagline: Every Child, A Champion — building confidence, teamwork, and memories beyond the game

name: Power BI Essentials : Turning Data into impact
description: This Power BI workshop offers students practical, hands-on experience in data visualization and business intelligence. Participants will learn to transform raw data into insightful reports and dashboards, enhancing their analytical skills and decision-making capabilities. The workshop provides real-world applications and interactive sessions, preparing students for industry demands in data-driven roles.
short_description: Power BI workshop providing students hands-on training in data visualization and business intelligence skills.
tagline: Conquer the Unconquered

name: Spectra
description: Build your own AI-powered smartwatch from scratch in this two-day hands-on workshop! Your wearable will feature an OLED display showing date, time, health stats, environmental readings, and team branding. Track heart rate, blood oxygen, step count, sense temperature and pressure, and interact with your watch via AI chatbot. Upon completion, you’ll take home a fully functional smartwatch you built yourself.
short_description: Create your own AI-powered smartwatch with an OLED display, health tracking, environmental sensing, step count, and AI chatbot interaction.
tagline: Track fitness, manage health, and stay connected - all from your wrist.

name: Tote-ally Blocked Out 2.0
description:
Tote-ally Blocked Out is back—this time to spark innovation through tradition!
 SPICMACAY brings you the timeless art of Rajasthani block printing. Discover how centuries-old craftsmanship meets modern creativity as you explore block printing with hand-carved wooden blocks, precise alignment, and layered colors to create colourful motifs. Finally, add your personal touch by customizing your tote bag, making it a keepsake that reflects your unique style.
 Walk away with a handcrafted tote that’s not just a keepsake, but a celebration of tradition, technique, and creativity combined.
short_description: Tote-ally Blocked Out is back! With SPICMACAY, discover the elegance of Rajasthani block printing. Explore patterns, play with colours, and craft your own tote bag. Take home a creation that blends tradition, artistry, and your personal touch—a keepsake made by you, for you.
tagline: Your Tote, Your Story, Your Style

name: Scratch & Hatch
description:
Scratch & Hatch is an engaging hands-on workshop designed to introduce students to the exciting world of game development using Scratch, a beginner-friendly visual programming language developed by MIT.
In this workshop, participants will learn the basics of Scratch, explore its drag-and-drop coding blocks, and understand how to bring animations, characters, and interactions to life. Step by step, they will be guided through the process of creating their very own interactive game—from setting up sprites and backgrounds to adding movements, sounds, and scoring systems.
The workshop emphasizes learning by doing. Rather than just theory, participants will actively follow along, experimenting with Scratch as they build a game together with the instructor. By the end of the session, each participant will have not only learned the fundamentals of coding logic but also created a working game they can proudly share and expand upon.
This workshop is perfect for beginners with no prior coding experience. All you need is curiosity and creativity—Scratch will take care of the rest!
short_description: Scratch & Hatch is a beginner-friendly workshop where you’ll learn to design and code your very own game using Scratch. No prior coding experience needed—just bring your creativity and hatch your first game!
tagline: Scratch the code, Hatch the future

name: 404: Cure Not Found
description: 404: Cure Not Found is a two-day event designed to engage participants through exploration and innovation. The event begins with a treasure hunt on Day 1, where teams follow a sequence of clues that would lead to a disease-related problem statement. Once the problem is uncovered, teams will be given time to analyze and prepare their solutions. On Day 2, the ideathon will take place, during which teams will present their proposed solutions to a panel of faculty judges. Solutions are evaluated on clarity, feasibility, and originality.
short_description: 404: Cure Not Found is a two-day event featuring a treasure hunt, where teams would uncover the problem statement on Day 1, followed by an ideathon on Day 2 where teams present solutions to a faculty panel.
tagline: Decode the Clues , Devise the Cure

name: Fitkit
description: The Health Club, in collaboration with the Culinary Club and Nutrition Club, presents Fitkit — a mini-hackathon blending technology with healthy living. Teams of 4 will design digital solutions (apps, websites, or tools) that analyze cooking inputs to identify ingredients and provide nutritional breakdowns. Extra credit goes to healthy substitutions, personalized meal suggestions, and smart kitchen integration.
club: Health club X culinary club X nutrition club
short_description: Fitkit, a mini-hackathon by Health, Culinary, and Nutrition Clubs, challenges participants to build tech solutions for nutrition analysis and healthier cooking.
tagline: When coding meets cooking for a healthier tomorrow

name: Bits and Beats
description: Bits and Beats is a hands-on workshop introducing audio signal processing using MATLAB and Simulink. Participants will explore the fundamentals of DSP through a mini-project on creating chorus and flanger effects, gaining practical experience in real-time audio processing—an excellent foundation for careers in audio engineering, DSP, embedded systems, and music production.
short_description: Hands-on MATLAB workshop on audio signal processing with mini-projects on chorus and flanger effects using Simulink.
tagline: Engineering the Echo of Tomorrow

name: Quadcopter
description: Join Quadcopter, an exciting 3-day hands-on workshop where you’ll build, fly, and keep your own drone! From unboxing the kit to final flight, our experts guide every step. Explore drone technology, experience the thrill of flight, and watch your creation soar. Perfect for enthusiasts and beginners alike—build it, fly it, own it. Your drone journey starts here!
short_description: Build, fly, and own your drone in this 3-day hands-on workshop—experience drone technology, flight thrills, and innovation.
tagline: From assembly to flight, create and own your personal drone adventure today.

name: Build-A-Terr 2.0
description: Discover your creativity at Build-A-Terr 2.0, a hands-on workshop where you craft your own unique terrarium in a jar. Design, build, and personalize your miniature green world and then take it home as a living keepsake!
short_description: Discover your creativity at Build-A-Terr 2.0- where you craft, build and personalize your own terrarium in a jar!
tagline: Bottle up a Forest!

name: HackXpertise 2.0
description: HackXpertise 2.0, the flagship event of IEEE TEMS at graVITas’25, is a thrilling two-day experience into the world of hackathons. Participants will learn from industry experts through engaging workshops, explore essential tools and practices, and then showcase their skills in an exciting hackathon. It’s where creativity, collaboration, and innovation come together to build impactful solutions.
short_description: HackXpertise 2.0 is a two-day flagship event blending workshops and a hackathon, sparking creativity, collaboration, and real-world innovation.
tagline: A Hitchhiker’s Guide to Hackathon: your journey through creativity, code, and collaboration.

name: Helix
description: Step into the world of game creation with Helix, a beginner friendly workshop on 3D game development using Unity. Step by step, you will be creating a physics based 3D runner set in a rotating tunnel where gravity flips at your command and obstacles challenge you, while learning Unity, C#, and object oriented programming through hands-on practice.
short_description: Start your game development journey with Helix, a beginner friendly Unity workshop featuring a 3D runner with gravity flipping mechanics.
tagline: Turn the world upside down with creativity, physics, and interactive game challenges.

name: InnovChem Workshop : Innovation Through Chemistry
description: The first session of the event will comprise approximately five guest lectures, followed by a poster presentation session in the second half
short_description: Guest lectures on the new trends in the fields of Chemistry followed by poster presentation.
tagline: Catalyzing Breakthroughs, Crafting Tomorrow

name: Crisis Inc. 2.0
description: Crisis Inc. is an intense corporate crisis simulation where newly promoted department heads race against time to solve evolving company problems. Participants pitch in novel solutions, collaborate for the common cause, and adapt to sudden changes. Creativity, strategy, and teamwork are tested in every round, culminating in a high-stakes final crisis where only the sharpest, most cooperative team emerges victorious.
short_description: Crisis Inc. challenges newly promoted department heads to solve evolving company crises with creativity, strategy, and teamwork—think fast, lead wisely, and outsmart the crisis!
tagline: Placements @ Crisis Inc.

name: Bot or Not
description: Bot or Not is a high-energy workshop on deepfake detection. Using Python, TensorFlow, and CNNs, you’ll uncover how AI fakes are made and learn to spot them. From real datasets to building your own model, you’ll gain practical skills, a working project, and sharper instincts for distinguishing real from fake.
short_description: Bot or Not: A hands-on workshop to detect deepfakes using Python, TensorFlow, and CNNs with real datasets.
tagline: Fake it till you break it — deepfake detection made real.

name: PyQuest
description: Forget boring theory - this is Python in action! In this hands-on workshop, you’ll build a useful project. Guided step-by-step by speaker, you’ll code, experiment and customize your own creation. Walk away with both a working build and the confidence to take Python beyond the classroom. Ready to turn ideas into reality? Get ready to code your way to something amazing!
club: THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY (IET)
short_description: A hands-on Python workshop where you build, customize and work on a project - guided step-by-step to boost skills and confidence
tagline: Where Curiosity Meets Code

name: Eduplay Sprint
description: This design sprint will focus on transforming tough academic topics into engaging and interactive learning games. Using gamification and creative design methods, participants will develop solutions that make complex subjects easier, fun, and interactive.
short_description: This design sprint will focus on transforming tough academic topics into engaging and interactive learning games. Using gamification and creative design methods, participants will develop solutions that make complex subjects easier, fun, and interactive.
tagline: Play Your Way into the Future of Learning.

name: ARTIVISM
description:
Step into a space where imagination meets purpose! ARTIVISM at Gravitas is not just an event it’s a movement. Join us for a craftathon where craft and  creativity are used as powerful tools to highlight pressing social issues like climate change, waste management, gender
equality, and mental health. Get ready to express yourself, collaborate with peers, and create impactful
crafts that speak volumes. Whether you’re raising awareness or proposing solutions, every piece you craft will be a step toward making a difference.
short_description: Step into a space where imagination meets purpose! ARTIVISM at Gravitas is not just an event it’s a movement. Join us for a craftathon where craft and  creativity are used as powerful tools to highlight pressing social issues like climate change, waste management, gender equality, and mental health. Get ready to express yourself, collaborate with peers, and create impactful crafts that speak volumes. Whether you’re raising awareness or proposing solutions, every piece you craft will be a step toward making a difference.
tagline: CRAFTING SOLUTIONS, CREATING IMPACT

name: PLAYNAMICS
description: Playnamics is more than just a game development marathon ,it’s a high-energy creative playground where ideas turn into interactive realities. Across this action-packed event, you’ll dive deep into the exciting world of game creation through a perfect blend of learning, hands-on building, and collaboration. We’ve lined up inspiring speaker sessions featuring experts from entrepreneurship, technology, and design & storytelling. But it’s not all talk ,our hands-on workshop will guide you step-by-step through building your own game, from brainstorming and prototyping to polishing gameplay and visuals. You’ll team up with fellow participants to brainstorm wild ideas, solve creative challenges, and bring your vision to life. Whether you’re just starting out or already have a few game projects under your belt, Playnamics is your chance to learn new skills, unleash your creativity, and connect with a community of passionate makers , all in an atmosphere buzzing with innovation and fun.
short_description:
Playnamics is a game development workshop , a creative playground where participants can learn, build, and experience the process of making a game from scratch along with their friends. Mentors and two expert speakers will be there as ultimate power-ups,
 helping to level up skills and ideas.
tagline: From player to creator!

name: Synaptic Sprint
description: This is a high energy, relay style event where teams act as neurons racing through brain loves. Participants solve biology based cognitive challenges to restore a failing cortex, combining neuroscience, teamwork, and strategy in a fast-paced format.
short_description: Brain Simulation game where each of the rounds are based on the four lobes of the brain
tagline: Neurons on the run

name: ASCENDRIX
description: ASCENDRiX is a life-sized board game where players act as tokens, navigating numbered squares by rolling dice. Each square presents a management-related challenge, such as problem-solving or resource allocation. The game, which simulates real-life management scenarios, emphasizes strategic thinking, teamwork, and adaptive learning, with players collaborating to overcome setbacks and achieve objectives.
short_description: A life-sized management board game where players tackle strategic challenges, fostering teamwork, problem-solving, and adaptability.
tagline: Conquer the Unconquered

name: Right! A Tune
description:
The Music Club, an elite club at VIT, is home to some of the most talented musicians
who bring together "Right! A Tune," an opportunity-rich flagship event that
blends technology, music production, and performance all in one with an
additional Music Production Workshop on the first day.
This is a song-creation competitive hackathon with a cash prize for the top 3 winners.
The participants may participate solo, in a pair or as a team. They can find their collaborations before or during the event.
Spanning 48 hours, "Right! A Tune" is a dream come true for aspiring producers looking for the right opportunity to learn, connect and create music they love. Participants form teams, write, arrange and produce their own music from scratch. The best part? Their work gets released on Spotify, Apple Music and other major digital streaming platforms.
short_description: A 48 Hour Overnight Music Production hackathon focused on music enthusiasts who want to bring their musical creativity to life. Participants may find collaborators and form teams to write, record and mix their original songs. The Music Club will also host a music production workshop from industry level expert. Winners may receive cash prizes.
tagline: When the clock strikes creativity!

name: Health tech
description: The Health Tech Ideathon is a one-day innovation challenge where participants create impactful solutions for real-world problems in healthcare, fitness, and wellness. Problem statements will be shared in advance, giving teams time to brainstorm and prepare their ideas. On the event day, the first half will be dedicated to final preparation and refining concepts, while the second half will focus on presentations. Solutions may take the form of mobile apps, wearable devices, AI-based systems, or smart community initiatives. The event aims to inspire creativity, practicality, and social impact. Exciting prizes await the most innovative and meaningful ideas.
short_description: Participate in the Health Tech Ideathon! Brainstorm innovative ideas in healthcare, fitness, and wellness, present your solutions, and win exciting prizes.
tagline: Innovating Health, Empowering Lives: Your Ideas for a Better Tomorrow.

name: Ignition'25
description: Ignition’25 is a fast-paced ideathon that fuses strategy games with real-world problem-solving. From hyperlink races on Wikipedia to innovation challenges and idea pitches, teams will battle it out for the title of Ignition’25 Champions.
short_description: Ignition’25 is a thrilling ideathon blending strategy games and innovation challenges, where teams compete creatively to become ultimate champions.
tagline: Spark Ideas. Fuel Innovation.

name: Code Blue
description: Biotech Meets Detective Work – This event transforms participants into investigators, blending the thrill of crime-solving with the precision of biotechnology. From analysing genetic traits to matching microbial morphologies, every clue is rooted in real scientific principles to make the experience truly exciting and educational. Participants enter a dual mindset - one to think like a scientist - solve biotech puzzles, and the other to reason like a detective - to win the race against time, connect the dots before time slips away.
short_description: Biotech Meets Detective Work: Solve thrilling, science-based mysteries by thinking like a detective and a scientist in this immersive, engaging event.
tagline: Unravel the code. Rewrite the future.

name: SENSORA
description: SENSORA 2025, the flagship international techno-management event of ISOI–VIT, will be held on 26–27 September at VIT Vellore during Gravitas. Featuring expert workshops, industry talks, and a 36-hour hackathon, it brings together students, innovators, and leaders from companies like Siemens, SAGE and Shark Tank-funded startups, focusing on AI, IoT, healthcare, and wireless systems to drive impactful innovation.
short_description: SENSORA 2025, ISOI–VIT’s flagship international techno-management event, brings together innovators, developers, and leaders for workshops, talks, and a 36-hour hackathon—where creativity, collaboration, and technology drive groundbreaking innovations.
tagline: Hack hard, play harder — because the future belongs to those who never stop.

name: CyberX 2025: Unlocking Hidden Hacks & Defenses
description:
To introduce students to real-world cybersecurity challenges and defense techniques in WiFi
 Security, IoT Devices, Social Media Safety, and Bug Bounty Hunting with live
 demonstrations, hidden tools, and hands-on insights.
short_description: NA
tagline: Decoding Hacks, Building Shields

name: Farm-a-thon
description: The event aims to bridge the gap between farmers and technology, promoting sustainable and smart farming practices.
short_description: The event aims to bridge the gap between farmers and technology, promoting sustainable and smart farming practices.
tagline: Seeding tomorrow's tech.

name: Battle in Borderland
description: Teams battle through four thrilling rounds: escape a clue-filled room in 10 minutes, race sequentially in the Wikipedia Relay where the slowest team is cut, crack hidden codes to stop a ticking bomb, and finally face the Split or Steal showdown—where trust, bluff, and strategy decide whether teams share glory, seize it all, or lose everything.
short_description: Escape rooms, relay races, code-breaking, and a final trust showdown—four thrilling rounds testing teamwork, speed, logic, and strategy
tagline: From secrets to strategy, speed to psychology — only the sharpest team survives all.

name: Hands on Robotics
description:
Hands on Robotics is a two-day premium event organized by RoboVITics, aimed at providing students with a practical and immersive introduction to the fascinating world of robotics. This workshop combines interactive theory sessions with engaging hands-on activities, ensuring that participants not only understand the concepts but also apply them in real time. Guided by experienced speakers and supported by dedicated volunteers, participants will receive step by step assistance throughout the event. This approach ensures a strong foundation in essential robotics principles while fostering active learning and collaboration.

The event is designed to offer an interdisciplinary experience, bringing together elements of electronics, programming, and mechanical design. Participants will embark on a journey to create their own web dashboard-controlled robot, learning to design and develop a custom web interface to control their bot.They will be using websockets, learning IoT to apply communication protocol to control the robot. Alongside this, they will work on building the robot’s physical structure using various tools and components, applying knowledge from multiple domains in a practical and exciting manner. By the end of the event, students will have a complete understanding of the process from concept to execution while gaining valuable skills in working with ESP32, MicroPython, and web technologies.

Hands on Robotics is more than just a workshop; it is an opportunity to innovate, explore, and take the first step toward mastering robotics. It promises a holistic, project-based learning experience that bridges theory and practice, empowering participants to create something extraordinary.
short_description:
Build, code, and command your own robot in just 2 days! 
Hands-On Robotics is a practical, beginner-friendly workshop where you assemble a bot, program it with micropython, and control it in real time via a slick WebSocket web dashboard on your laptop or a mobile phone. Expect bite-sized theory, lots of tinkering, and instant feedback as your bot comes alive. Wrap up with a fun mini-challenge and leave with real skills, a working robot, and confidence to keep creating.
tagline: Robotics Made Easy: Build, Code, Control.

name: Techno Treasure Hunt : RF Rescue Edition
description: RF Rescue Edition is an exciting team-based treasure hunt where players solve RF and microwave-themed puzzles to unlock hidden clues. Teams of 3-5 race across 5–7 clue stations, cracking codes, scanning QR hints, and decoding signals. The adventure culminates in a final mission: restoring the lab by defeating signal interference through teamwork, logic, and discovery.
short_description: RF Rescue Edition: A campus treasure hunt where teams decode RF puzzles, chase clues, and save the lab from signal interference.
tagline: “Decode the Clues. Rescue the Frequency.”

name: Make-A-Smile
description: MAKE-A-SMILE is an event by Becoming I Foundation (BIF) at VIT, reimagining our FLAGSHIP EVENT Smile event with an exciting STEM-based twist. Continuing the tradition of spreading joy during Riviera and now extending to Gravitas, this edition blends creativity, learning, and fun in a hands-on environment. In collaboration with local schools, BIF welcomes children to VIT for an inspiring day of teamwork and exploration. Guided by dedicated VIT student volunteers, participants will form small teams to build innovative projects using specially curated STEM kits—creations they can proudly take home. Alongside the technical activities, MAKE-A-SMILE retains the essence original Smile event with games and moments of shared laughter.
short_description: MAKE-A-SMILE by Becoming I Foundation (BIF) at VIT reimagines our flagship Smile event with a STEM twist. Extending from Riviera to Gravitas, the event brings local schoolchildren to VIT for a day of creativity, teamwork, and fun. Guided by student volunteers, children will use STEM kits to build projects they can take home, while also enjoying games and the joy that has always defined Smile.
tagline: Make-A-Smile: Where Joy Meets Genius

name: Purble Place
description:
Purble Place is a light-hearted and engaging competition that brings out the creativity of participants through the art of cake decorating. Designed as a casual yet skillful event, it encourages participants to experiment with color theory, design, and presentation while working under constraints that add an exciting challenge.
 Each team will be provided with a plain cake base along with a limited set of basic cream colors. Using these, they must decorate their cakes into an imaginative and visually appealing art piece. Since only primary colors will be supplied, participants will need to mix and experiment to generate additional colors, thereby testing both their creativity and practical understanding of color blending.
 The event will be conducted in two slots to ensure that all participants have adequate time and space to work comfortably. Within their given time frame, participants will plan, design, and execute their cake decoration.
short_description: Purble Place is a cake decorating event that encourages participants to experiment with color theory. Each team will be provided with a plain cake base along with a limited set of basic cream colors. Within their given time frame, participants will plan, design, and execute their cake decoration.
tagline: Turning simplicity into sweet art

name: Cicada 3300
description: CICADA 3300 is a mystery-filled competition where you solve puzzles, crack codes, and uncover hidden clues. From ciphers and visual tricks to logic and memory challenges, every stage takes you deeper into the unknown. It’s not just about solving problems, but about discovering what lies beyond them. You weren’t meant to find this, You were meant to awaken. Matrix te tenet — nisi te ipsum perdas.
short_description: CICADA 3300 is a mystery-filled competition where you solve puzzles , ciphers ,  crack codes, and uncover hidden clues  pushing your logic, memory, and curiosity deeper into the unknown.
tagline: The glitch wasn’t a mistake, it was a message.

name: SAE AirShow
description: Team Vimaanas & Rotor FPV from SAE-VIT presents AirShow! Witness thrilling aerial stunts and engineering mastery in a two-part spectacle: Team Vimaanas takes to the skies with high-speed model aircraft in the first half, followed by Rotor FPV's heart-pumping drone show in the second half!
short_description: Team Vimaanas & Rotor FPV from SAE-VIT presents AirShow: Planes & drones unite for a thrilling aerial spectacle of speed & skill!
tagline: Experience the thrill of flight with stunning aerial stunts and engineering brilliance.

name: Into the Micro-Verse
description: Into the Micro-Verse is an interactive strategy game where players guide microbial teams through survival challenges. Stages include Immune Evasion, Antibiotic Resistance, Metabolic Rewiring, and CRISPR-Phage Defence. Side quests provide boosts like cloaks, resistance genes, or shields. Every decision shapes the final “evolved” microbe. Blending science, creativity, and competition, Micro-Verse makes adaptation the key to victory.
club: STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (SABEST)
short_description: Into the Micro-Verse is a competitive simulation where players engineer microbial survival by strategizing immune evasion, antibiotic resistance, metabolic rewiring, and CRISPR-based phage defence.
tagline: Microscopic world. Massive stakes.

name: iOS Fusion 8.0
description: Our flagship event is back, more thrilling than ever! Kickstart your journey with iOS fundamentals and dive into exciting ML-powered applications. Then, take on challenging hackathon tracks designed to test your creativity and skills to the fullest. Get inspired by top Swift community speakers, experiment with iOS + ML possibilities, and battle it out for exciting prizes!
short_description: iOS Fusion is back! Learn iOS basics, explore ML, hear from Swift experts, and compete for exciting prizes.
tagline: Tap into Innovation

name: Hackatopia
description: An ideathon where participants transform their ideas into basic project structures—such as simple web prototypes—and then get the chance to pitch them on stage. The event is designed to give maximum participants this opportunity, encouraging not just coding but also creativity, clarity, and entrepreneurial thinking. By blending innovation with presentation, it aims to spark an entrepreneurial mindset, motivating participants to see their ideas as potential startups while providing a fun, collaborative, and pitch-driven environment
short_description: An ideathon where participants build prototypes, pitch ideas, and ignite entrepreneurial thinking in a creative, collaborative, and fun environment.
tagline: Where every idea gets a voice

name: Pixelens
description: Join us for a 10-hour immersive workshop where creativity meets technology! Guided by an expert animator, participants will explore storytelling, character creation, and visual development while mastering Blender’s powerful tools for modeling, animation, and rendering. From concept to screen, learn the complete workflow of producing an animated film. Perfect for beginners and aspiring filmmakers alike!
short_description: A 10-hour workshop blending storytelling and Blender skills—learn to craft, animate, and render your own animated film.
tagline: Model, Animate, Render.

name: CodeXcape
description: CodeXcape is an enthralling 24 Hour event that will have three unique and exciting rounds. Jeopardy - The Trivia Round. Scotland Yard - The Strategy Round. Hackathon - The Innovation Round. The Jeopardy Round will have 5-10 Questions per team that will be divided into 5 levels of difficulties ranging from very easy to very challenging. Right answers will gain the teams MozCoins depending on the level of difficulty of the question and an appropriate MozCoins deduction will be made for every wrong answer as well. Once the Jeopardy round is over we will move into the Scotland Yard round which will have multiple lobbies and each lobby will have 6 teams. 5 detective teams and 1 Mr.X (Imposter) team. The imposter's location will be revealed every 5 moves and based on that the detectives are supposed to track Mr.X. Based on how close each detective is to Mr.X , they get some amount of MozCoins and the same goes for Mr.X. Mr.X gains MozCoins for how far away from the detectives he is. The detectives and Mr.X also have the opportunity to spend points in round 2. Detectives can use MozCoins to know the location of Mr.X at any move and Mr.X can use MozCoins to warp to some preset location if he knows the detectives are close. The showpiece round is the hackathon which will be a unique take on hackathons. The teams will have randomised problem statements. They can change their problem statement to some other random problem statement by spending MozCoins. Other than this there will be several ways to spend MozCoins in the hackathon like mentorship and time extensions. The final marking will be accounted by hackathon for 80% and 20% by the remainder of MozCoins left in their account
short_description: CodeXcape is an enthralling 24-hour competition structured around three distinct rounds and a strategic currency called MozCoins. The event begins with a trivia round, "Jeopardy," where teams accumulate MozCoins by correctly answering questions of varying difficulty. Next, in the "Scotland Yard" strategy round, teams play as detectives or an imposter, earning coins based on their ability to track or evade, and can spend them on tactical advantages. The final and main event is the Hackathon, where teams use their accumulated MozCoins to purchase critical resources like new problem statements, mentorship, or time extensions. A team's final victory is calculated with the hackathon project heavily weighted at 80% of the score, while their leftover MozCoins account for the remaining 20%.
tagline: Outwit with trivia, outplay with strategy, and out-code the competition in 24 hours.

name: The Last Experiment!
description:
Unravel a chilling mystery at Murder at the Molecular Lab! 
 Dr. Aurelia Sparks has been found dead before presenting her breakthrough fuel formula.
 Teams race against time to solve chemistry-based puzzles and expose the killer.
 10 minutes, 4 suspects, 1 deadly chemical — can you crack the case?
short_description: Unravel a thrilling lab mystery! Solve chemistry puzzles, interrogate suspects, and race against time to expose Dr. Sparks’ killer.
tagline: "Forensic Fun, Catalyst Style!”

name: UI/UX Design Hackathon
description: The hackathon will focus on digital problem-solving through UI/UX design, encouraging participants to create innovative solutions for real-world challenges across diverse domains.
short_description: The hackathon will focus on digital problem-solving through UI/UX design, encouraging participants to create innovative solutions for real-world challenges across diverse domains.
tagline: Design. Disrupt. Define the Future

name: Painted Panes
description:
The Painted Panes Workshop invites participants to explore the art of transforming plain glass into striking, decorative pieces.
 
 Designed for beginners and art enthusiasts alike, the session introduces simple techniques and creative approaches that bring colours and patterns to life. 
 
 It offers a hands-on experience that combines learning with creativity, allowing participants to craft unique designs that reflect their personal style.
club: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STUDENTS OF ARCHITECTURE (NASA)
short_description: Brighten your day at Painted Panes! Learn fun, easy glass-painting techniques to create vibrant, customised art pieces!
tagline: Don’t be shy! Dive in and just pane it bright !

name: Padakkalam 1.0
description:
PADAKALAM 1.0 creatively blends Malayalam literature and technology. Its Prompt Quest challenge has teams use AI to generate clues for hidden words, movies, songs, or proverbs, testing their wit and tech-savvy.
 Malayalam Cypher is a high-tech scavenger hunt that blends Malayalam literature with augmented reality. Teams solve cryptic clues to collect digital fragments of a famous saying and then must recite it perfectly to win.
short_description: Prompt Quest teams use AI prompts to generate clues for Malayalam words, movies, or proverbs. Malayalam Cypher is an AR scavenger hunt where teams decipher poetic clues and collect fragments of a saying to recite.
tagline:
ഒലക്കാലം പിന്നിട്ടു, ഇന്നീ സാഹിത്യം ക്ലിക്കിലും സ്ക്രോളിലും ജീവിക്കുന്ന കാലം.”
 From palm-leaf writing to digital screens, literature begins a new journey

name: Hazard Protocol
description: Hazard Protocol is a real-life strategy game where engineers and logistics race to finish tasks, sort and transport materials. Hidden among them is an imposter who sabotages with hazards, contaminations, and power-ups like freezes and lab lockdowns. Safety Officers must spot errors, call meetings, and vote out suspects. A thrilling mix of teamwork, deception, and engineering challenges!
short_description: Hazard Protocol: Engineers and logistics race tasks while an imposter sabotages with hazards. Safety Officers must uncover truth.
tagline: Sabotage is in the Air.

name: DESYNC X BGMI (TAG)
description: Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI) is a mobile battle royale game exclusive to Indian players, developed by Krafton. Up to 64 players parachute onto diverse maps, gather weapons, and compete to be the last one standing. BGMI features solo and squad modes, strategic gameplay, frequent events, and regular updates for immersive action in a fast-paced, shrinking battlefield
short_description: Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI) delivers thrilling battle royale action, where 64 players compete in intense, fast-paced survival matches. Play, fight, and conquer!
tagline: Enter The Glitch. Embrace The Chaos

name: Nritya Paadhai
description: Get ready to dance, smile, and move with Nritya Paadhai! This exciting Bharatanatyam workshop, led by classically trained members of SPIC MACAY, VIT Vellore, is your ticket to discovering one of India’s most graceful and powerful dance forms. Through fun activities, you'll learn its history, explore basic postures and rhythmic adavus, express yourself through abhinaya and beautiful mudras. By the end, you'll even perform a simple piece together! Perfect for beginners and dance lovers, it's all about having fun while stepping into the world of tradition, rhythm, and storytelling. Come, feel the rhythm, and make every step count!
short_description: Discover the graceful and powerful art of Bharatanatyam! Learn postures, rhythmic adavus, abhinaya, and beautiful mudras through fun, beginner-friendly activities - and perform a simple piece together. Come and join us to feel the rhythm, express yourself, and make every step a story!
tagline: From Traditional Roots to Timeless Expressions

name: Squid Game: The Final Showdown
description: Squid Game: The Final Showdown is an electrifying four-round competition blending endurance, strategy, strength, and creativity. Starting with 150 participants, players face iconic challenges like Red Light, Green Light, Tug of War, and unique engineering-inspired battles. With eliminations at every stage, only one team of two will survive the tests of agility, teamwork, and skill to claim ultimate victory.
short_description: Squid Game: The Final Showdown challenges 150 players through endurance, strategy, and creativity, with only two emerging victorious.
tagline: “The Arena of Elimination. The Glory of Survival.”

name: Grid Grab
description: Grid Grab is a fast-paced, Monopoly-inspired team challenge where 3–5 players per team join forces to test their knowledge, strategy, and innovation. Teams compete in quiz rounds, earn resources, and trade or outsmart rivals to seize control of the grid. The event runs in two slots—morning and evening—with different teams battling it out. Every move comes with hidden twists, so think fast, play smart, and roll your way to victory!
club: STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (SABEST)
short_description: Grid Grab is a fast-paced team challenge where knowledge and strategy help you earn resources, outsmart rival teams, and control the grid.
tagline: Compete with knowledge, trade resources, and use strategy to master the grid for victory.

name: Antidote Hunt
description: In a quaint little town nestled into the landscape, it is rumored to be the home of a mad scientist with ideas so radical, his experiments have been classified as crimes against humanity. Sources suggest that his most recent project is some kind of pathogen so dangerous that, if released would cause a mass extinction event. Through an underground network, a pathogen sample from one of his tests has been obtained. The secret service has decided to hire some of the world's best scientists to find a cure for the pathogen before it breaks out. The participants will assume the role of the scientists, working in teams to uncover the contents of the sample. The teams will be tested at each turn, having to run chromatographs, read data, and find staining patterns to accurately identify the mystery pathogen. The final goal is to find the antidote for the disease. The team to accurately find the cure the fastest will be lauded as heroes among their peers and will be rewarded by the Secret Service for their courage in the face of doom.
short_description: Elite biotech operatives take on a mission-style challenge. Decode antidotes, analyze samples, and race to trace the pathogen through chromatography, staining, and more, all in a high-stakes, lab-driven battle for survival.
tagline: From outbreak to Breakthrough

name: Potternova
description: Potternova is a Harry Potter–themed tech event where magic blends with technology. Across two days, participants tackle coding, debugging, and problem-solving challenges with a magical twist. Creativity, logic, and teamwork are key as teams navigate unique tasks inspired by the wizarding world, making this an unforgettable journey into tech wizardry.
short_description: Potternova is a Harry Potter–themed tech event blending coding, logic, and creativity with magical twists and challenges.
tagline: Where magic meets logic, unleash your wizardry through spells of code and tech challenges.

name: Fuel Of Shadows
description: Fuel of Shadows is a multi-stage escape room that challenges participants to restore power in a simulated blackout scenario. Through timed puzzles rooted in logic, circuitry, and mechanical design, teams must collaborate, think critically, and race against the clock to escape the shadows. Designed for thrill-seekers and problem-solvers, this event blends immersive storytelling with real-world engineering challenges.
short_description: Fuel of shadows is an escape room type game based on automobiles.
tagline: Unleash the secret. Race the shadows. Claim the truth.

name: Light-com' 2025
description: Light-com' 2025 is an engaging workshop introducing participants to the fundamentals of fiber optics communication and optical networks. Aimed at students, researchers, and enthusiasts, the event blends essential theory with practical experience. The key highlight is hands-on training with OPTISYSTEM, a specialized simulation software widely used for designing and analyzing optical systems. By the end, participants will gain both a clear understanding of fiber optics basics and valuable skills with industry-relevant tools. Light-com‚Äô2025 offers a unique chance to learn, practice, and explore the future of optical¬†networking.
short_description: Light-com'2025  is workshop which explores the basics of fiber optics communication and optical netwoks. This event provides an unique opportunity to get hands on training in specialised simulation software called 'OPTISYSTEM'
tagline: Hands on training in Optisystem software

name: Drone Show
description: Get ready to witness the night sky come alive at graVITas!  For the first time ever at VIT, hundreds of synchronized drones will take flight, painting the heavens with dazzling lights and intricate formations. This cutting-edge blend of art, technology, and imagination will transform the skyline into a canvas of breathtaking patterns, stories, and magical moments. A spectacle unlike any other, the drone show promises to leave you inspired and awestruck as the stars of innovation dance above you.
short_description: Experience the magic of the skies at Gravitas—where hundreds of drones light up the night with stunning stories and technology in motion!
tagline: Watch the Night Come Alive

name: AR Makeover Mastery + Mini Hackathon
description:
Two-day Gen AI & Social AR Workshop: This for your university students, designed to introduce them to the latest creative technology trends. This fully hands-on workshop will empower learners to create interactive and immersive experiences using Generative AI and Snap AR’s Lens Studio. Following to this students will take part in a mini hackathon where they work on theam based AR creation to showcase their projects. Students will be awarded with certificate and cash prize based on project submission, goodies based on students participation.

Day 1: AR Makeover Mastery: Nail & Foot Edition (Workshop)
Day 2: Mini Hackathon (Hackathon)

Timing - 10:00 - 16:00
short_description: NA
tagline: NA

name: Ergonomics for Better Health
description: This workshop covers the Fundamentals of ergonomics, Ergonomics for better health, Applications of RULA and REBA for posture analysis, and a demonstration of ergonomically designed computer keyboard, computer mouse, and laptop bag on wheels. The participant will be trained to maintain correct posture while working on laptops to avoid health problems.
short_description: This workshop covers the Fundamentals of ergonomics, Ergonomics for better health, Applications of RULA and REBA for posture analysis, and a demonstration of ergonomically designed computer keyboard, computer mouse, and laptop bag on wheels. The participant will be trained to maintain correct posture while working on laptops to avoid health problems.
tagline: NA

name: From Architecture to Application: A Practical Dive into ARM7 Programming
description: This one-day hands-on workshop, “From Architecture to Application: A Practical Dive into ARM7 Programming,” guides UG students through ARM7 architecture, instruction sets, and LPC2148 microcontroller programming. With sessions on assembly and C programming using KEIL, it offers a structured, application-driven introduction to embedded systems development.
short_description: This one-day hands-on workshop, “From Architecture to Application: A Practical Dive into ARM7 Programming,” guides UG students through ARM7 architecture, instruction sets, and LPC2148 microcontroller programming. With sessions on assembly and C programming using KEIL, it offers a structured, application-driven introduction to embedded systems development.
tagline: ARM Programming

name: Clay and Play
description: Discover the joy of pottery in this hands-on workshop-no prior experience needed! Learn clay preparation, wheel techniques, and shaping methods from skilled instructors. Then, unleash your creativity to craft your own unique piece on the pottery wheel. Take home your handmade creation as a personal keepsake and a reminder of your artistic journey.
short_description: Experience pottery hands-on—learn clay, wheel, and shaping, then create and take home your unique handcrafted keepsake.
tagline: Craft your Vision

name: ReLifer Hackathon 2025
description: ReLifer Hackathon 2025 is a initiative jointly organized by VIT SHINE and IAMRAI to develop the world’s first AI-augmented, fully automated resuscitation system. Participants will co-create innovations including 3D-printed mannequins with biosensors, smart defibrillator systems, and a coordinated rescue app. This hackathon blends deep tech, biomedical design, and emergency response, focusing on intelligent CPR, ECG-guided defibrillation, real-time vitals feedback, and drone-AED delivery, transforming emergency care into an integrated, algorithm-driven, lifesaving ecosystem.
short_description: ReLifer Hackathon 2025 challenges innovators to build an AI-driven, fully automated life support system. Teams will develop smart mannequins, real-time CPR sensors, AED simulators, and a rescue coordination app, laying the foundation for first of its kind synchronized, algorithmic resuscitation platform, where automation meets emergency medicine.
tagline: Design - Train -Respond - Save lives

name: Nerf Wars
description: Nerf Wars is an exciting team-based activity where players use Nerf blasters and foam darts in a safe environment. Game modes like Capture the Flag, Team Elimination, and Base Defense test strategy, teamwork, and reflexes. The event promotes coordination, leadership, and problem-solving while delivering fun, energy, and friendly competition, ensuring a thrilling experience for all.
short_description: Nerf Wars uses Nerf guns and foam darts in thrilling battles, combining strategy, teamwork, and nonstop fun for participants.
tagline: Experience the thrill of Nerf battles where teamwork, strategy, and fun collide.

name: Trading Titans
description: Trading Titans is a high-energy finance management event where students and young professionals compete through strategic, business-themed challenges. From problem-solving simulations to leadership tasks, it blends competition with creativity. Participants sharpen critical thinking, teamwork, and decision-making—building real-world readiness while enjoying the thrill of dynamic, fast-paced management battles.
short_description: Trading Titans: A thrilling clash of strategy, finance, and leadership where future managers battle through dynamic business challenges.
tagline: Conquer the Unconquered

name: Fusion of CAM and Standards
description: Join us for a hands-on workshop diving into the world of Fusion 360, where design meets manufacturing. Learn how to create precise models, generate toolpaths, and understand key CAM (Computer-Aided Manufacturing) workflows — all while following industry standards to ensure accuracy, safety, and efficiency. Guided by an experienced instructor, you'll get practical insights and tips to take your CAD/CAM skills to the next level. Whether you're a beginner or looking to sharpen your expertise, this session will help you bridge the gap between design creativity and manufacturing precision.
short_description: This workshop offers a practical introduction to Fusion 360, focusing on the CAD (Computer-Aided Design) and CAM (Computer-Aided Manufacturing) processes. Participants will learn to create accurate 3D models and generate toolpaths for manufacturing, ensuring designs meet industry standards for safety, accuracy, and efficiency. This hands-on session is ideal for anyone wanting to improve their design and manufacturing skills, guided by an expert instructor.
tagline: Design. Simulate. Innovate. Unlock Your Creativity with Hands-On Fusion 360 Mastery!

name: SourceSprint
description: SourceSprint by IEEE-VIT is a dynamic open-source competition that begins with an essential workshop on Git and version control. Participants then apply their knowledge by tackling real-world coding challenges within our repositories. By resolving issues of varying difficulty, they accumulate points, competing to secure a top position on the leaderboard. The event culminates in recognizing and rewarding the three highest-scoring participants for their technical proficiency.
short_description: Master Git, then solve real-world coding issues to claim victory in IEEE-VIT's thrilling open-source programming showdown.
tagline: Debug, Improve, Repeat

name: ELEVATE
description: ELEVATE (Engineering Levitation for Advanced Transport & Energy), part of graVITas’25, is a national-level challenge where student teams from across India compete to design and simulate cutting-edge Maglev and Hyperloop systems using advanced CAD/CAE tools. Alongside the competition, the event features insightful talks and panel discussions by top industry professionals and academicians, providing unmatched exposure to the future of transportation. Early registrants get exclusive access to industry-grade simulation tools, along with networking opportunities and the chance to vie for an exciting prize pool. ELEVATE brings together aspiring engineers and innovators to shape the next generation of high-speed mobility.
short_description: ELEVATE is a two-day design contest and industry-academia expo, bringing together student teams from across the country to design and simulate futuristic Maglev and Hyperloop levitation systems using CAD/CAE tools. Alongside the competition, participants will attend expert talks on electromagnetism, Hyperloop technology, and related fields, gaining insights from leading industry professionals and top academicians.
tagline: Engineering Levitation for Advanced Transport & Energy – Transforming modern mobility

name: GamaLab
description: Gamasome in collaboration with RoboVITics is excited to host a 24-hour AI & Software Development Hackathon at GraVITas ’25, bringing together top student innovators to tackle real-world challenges through cutting-edge software solutions. Teams of two will compete in domains spanning artificial intelligence and software development. After a preliminary shortlisting, participants will tackle a problem statement unveiled at the start of the event, working intensively to deliver impactful & innovative solutions.Winners stand to earn cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Gamasome. This hackathon blends innovation, teamwork, and opportunity, forging the next generation of AI talent.
short_description: Gamasome, in collaboration with RoboVITics, is hosting a 24-hour AI & Software Development Hackathon at GraVITas ’25. Teams of two will compete on real-world challenges in AI and software, with problem statements revealed at the start.. Winners will receive cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Gamasome. This hackathon is a platform for innovation, teamwork, and shaping the next generation of AI talent. Participation is restricted to final year BTech students
tagline: Ideas in Action.

name: Math Premier League (MPL)
description: Math Premier League (MPL) is a thrilling 3 round team event mixing tech, logic, and adrenaline! Begin with a coding round to showcase programming skills, dash through a puzzle packed Treasure Hunt, and finish with the high stakes Jeopardy quiz where wit and knowledge decide the winner. From coding to clue chasing to quizzes, MPL is the arena to code, hunt, and conquer.
club: SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS (SIAM)
short_description: Math Premier League brings coding, puzzles, and quizzes together in a 3 round team event where teamwork, speed, and logic conquer.
tagline: Solve. Sprint. Survive. Welcome to MPL!

name: ART FROM THE HEART!
description:
Discover the joy of creating at this engaging workshop where art meets personalization. Try the flowing patterns of water marbling or design your own tote bags with vibrant colours and motifs.
