Each participant explores , experiments and leaves satisfied taking home a personalized tote that is more than just an accessory, its a reflection of you. 
Slots will be allocated via google forms .
All material will be provided by ARCH-I-TECH.
short_description: Art from the Heart lets you explore marble painting or tote design, leaving with a personalized creation that truly reflects you.
tagline: Art from the Heart: Crafted by you, for you.

name: Season Zero
description:
Step into Season Zero, where your favorite shows and movies come alive in a game like no other. Navigate through 3 rooms, each packed with challenges inspired by F.R.I.E.N.D.S, Brooklyn 99, The Conjuring, and Interstellar. Solve puzzles, laugh, get a little spooked, and test your wits at every turn.

Only the cleverest and quickest will make it through all rooms. Bring your friends, enjoy the twists, and aim to be the one winner who conquers all 4 shows. Fun, surprises, and a little madness await — are you ready to play?
short_description: Season Zero is a multi-round event reimagining Netflix hits as immersive challenges, blending puzzles, suspense, and fun-filled competition.
tagline: Streaming now on all platforms

name: Industry Academia Conlave 2025
description: The Industry Academia Conclave is organized to enhance the people management skills of Master of Social Work (HRM, CD, and M&P) students. Students from MBA and BBA can also benefit from the conclave. The conclave will have a platform for the students to gain knowledge and develop skills and competencies. It will also help students with networking for career opportunities.
short_description: The Industry Academia Conclave is organized to enhance the people management skills of Master of Social Work (HRM, CD, and M&P) students. Students from MBA and BBA can also benefit from the conclave. The conclave will have a platform for the students to gain knowledge and develop skills and competencies. It will also help students with networking for career opportunities.
tagline: People Expert

name: The Pitch Grid
description:
Get ready for the ultimate Business Challenge - Pitch Grid at gravitas 25!
More than an event, it's a battle of businesses and ideas where strategy meets innovation. Join us
for a intense 3-round showdown where teams of 3 participants tackle real-world case studies and
face industry driven challenges across industries like Pharma, Fashion, Green Energy, and more.
This Pitch Grid will test your critical thinking, business acumen, teamwork, strategic thinking and
industry readiness. Get ready to express yourself, collaborate with peers and create innovative
business models and make it sustain.
short_description: Get ready for the ultimate Business Challenge - Pitch Grid at gravitas 25! More than an event, it's a battle of businesses and ideas where strategy meets innovation. Join us for a intense 3-round showdown where teams of 3 participants tackle real-world case studies and face industry driven challenges across industries like Pharma, Fashion, Green Energy, and more. This Pitch Grid will test your critical thinking, business acumen, teamwork, strategic thinking and industry readiness. Get ready to express yourself, collaborate with peers and create innovative business models and make it sustain.
tagline: Gravitas Grid – Where Minds Outbid

name: Workshop on "AI driven Cobots for smarter Industries"
description: Gear up for the future with Cobots! .. Join our one-day workshop to explore how next-gen cobots powered by AI, IoT, and cloud are driving intelligent automation across industries. Discover cutting-edge applications and deployment strategies that make cobots indispensable in smart factories and beyond. Learn how cobots work alongside humans, discover their real-world applications, and understand the skills that will make you industry-ready. An exciting opportunity to boost your knowledge and career prospects — Prepare for the automation era - Register today! ... The future of work is collaborative!
short_description: SENSE school event
tagline: Empowering Industry 5.0 with Cobots

name: Vinhack
description:
The flagship hackathon of VinnovateIT is back... bigger, bolder, and built for the future. This isn’t just a hackathon; it’s your invitation to step into the tech renaissance, a revival of creativity, collaboration, and groundbreaking technology.

For 36 hours, innovators, developers, and creators will collaborate to turn daring ideas into real solutions. Armed with open-source tools, participants will dive deep into AI models, blockchain, VR/AR, gaming engines, IoT ecosystems, and cloud-native frameworks building projects that push the boundaries of what’s possible.

Tracks span across AI, IoT, Gaming, Sustainability, and Futuristic Tech, giving teams the freedom to explore, experiment, and disrupt. From immersive virtual worlds and autonomous systems to decentralized apps and sustainable tech, VinHack challenges you to imagine big and build bigger.

With expert mentors, cutting-edge resources, and a community of bold thinkers, VinHack is more than a competition, it’s a launchpad for the next generation of innovation.

Build. Share. Redefine the future.
short_description:
36 hours. Limitless innovation.
The flagship hackathon of VinnovateIT is back, bigger, bolder, and powered by open-source tools. Build disruptive solutions with AI, blockchain, VR/AR, gaming engines, IoT, and cloud-native frameworks. From virtual worlds to autonomous systems and decentralized apps, VinHack is where bold ideas become next-gen products.
tagline: Step into the Tech Renaissance

name: Hackulus
description:
"Hackulus 2025 is an exhilarating 24-hour hackathon organised by the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM) at VIT Vellore. This edition promises to be bigger and better, featuring 7 diverse tracks and expecting a turnout of 400–500 talented participants from across the country.
The hackathon aims to foster innovation and creativity, bringing together passionate individuals to develop impactful solutions to real-world challenges. Participants will compete across domains such as AI & Mathematical Modelling, Healthcare, Fintech, Open Innovation, VIT Centric and more, working under the continuous mentorship of industry experts and guided by cutting-edge insights.
Hackulus is not just a hackathon, it’s a platform to innovate, collaborate, and transform ideas into reality. By connecting students, professionals, and industry leaders, the event provides participants with exposure, networking opportunities, and the chance to showcase their skills to potential recruiters and sponsors. With its focus on technological advancement and community-driven problem-solving, Hackulus 2025 promises to deliver an unparalleled learning and innovation experience."
club: SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS (SIAM)
short_description: Hackulus is an exciting 24-hour hackathon organised by SIAM, VIT Vellore, bringing together 400–500 innovators across 7 diverse tracks. With expert mentorship and endless creativity, participants will develop real-world solutions to tackle today’s biggest challenges.
tagline: Where Ideas Meet Impact

name: 3D Quest
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-charged treasure hunt as two teams of 3–5 participants race against the clock! Each team will solve clever clues to discover hidden 3D printed puzzle pieces scattered across the iconic stretch from CDMM to SMV. With just 30 minutes to crack the code and complete the puzzle, only one team will claim victory and take home a unique 3D printed prize. Every second counts—will your team rise to the challenge and outsmart the competition?
short_description: Two teams race simultaneously against the clock, collecting and assembling parts. Winner takes it all.
tagline: Decode.Collect.Construct

name: HackBattle
description:
HackBattle, organized by IEEE Computer Society (IEEE CS), is a dynamic 36-hour hackathon designed to bring together the brightest innovators, passionate creators, and determined problem-solvers under one roof. It is more than just a coding marathon; it is a transformative journey where participants push the boundaries of creativity, technology, and teamwork.
Over the course of a thrilling overnight experience, students and professionals alike will work tirelessly to turn ideas into reality, tackling carefully curated real-world problem statements that demand innovative thinking and practical solutions. Teams will ideate, design, and build projects that not only demonstrate technical excellence but also create meaningful impact in society.
What sets HackBattle apart is its blend of competition and collaboration. While teams strive to outshine each other with their projects, the event fosters a supportive ecosystem where learning and knowledge-sharing are equally valued. Participants will have the opportunity to interact with mentors, industry leaders, and experts, gaining insights into emerging technologies, best practices, and career growth in the tech landscape.
The event is structured to ensure that creativity is matched with guidance and exposure. Alongside the hackathon, participants can attend exclusive workshops, tech talks, and panel discussions led by professionals who bring real-world experience to the table. These sessions not only help participants strengthen their technical skills but also inspire them to think bigger and bolder.
HackBattle is also a networking platform where aspiring innovators connect with like-minded peers, mentors, and organizations. Whether it is collaborating with teammates, learning from experts, or showcasing projects to potential recruiters and sponsors, participants gain experiences that extend far beyond the 36-hour challenge.
At its core, HackBattle is a celebration of innovation, teamwork, and the unstoppable energy of technology. It is a space where ideas take flight, where persistence meets passion, and where the leaders of tomorrow emerge with solutions that can shape the future.
short_description: HackBattle is a dynamic 36-hour hackathon where innovators, creators, and problem-solvers come together to code, collaborate, and compete. This overnight coding marathon is a fast-paced journey of turning ideas into reality, tackling real-world challenges, and building impactful solutions that push creativity and technical skill to the next level. Alongside the competition, participants will enjoy inspiring sessions from industry leaders, offering expert insights, practical guidance, and valuable networking. More than just an event, HackBattle is a vibrant celebration of innovation, teamwork, and the unstoppable energy of technology.
tagline: Less talk, more Hack

name: Career Expo (External)
description:
The Career Expo at graVITas’25 is your gateway to endless possibilities! 🚀
From cutting-edge tech innovations to dynamic non-tech career paths, this is where top companies and aspiring students meet. Discover opportunities, explore future skills, and gain real insights into the world of work. More than just an expo, it’s your chance to build connections, unlock potential, and step confidently into your future.
short_description: The Career Expo at graVITas’25 is your gateway to endless possibilities! 🚀 From cutting-edge tech innovations to dynamic non-tech career paths, this is where top companies and aspiring students meet. Discover opportunities, explore future skills, and gain real insights into the world of work. More than just an expo, it’s your chance to build connections, unlock potential, and step confidently into your future.
tagline: Step into your Future

name: The Tech Traitors Masquerade
description:
The Tech Traitors Masquerade is a high stakes deception game where players slip into secret roles as Faithfuls or Traitors. Faithfuls race to crack tech themed challenges such as coding puzzles, bug hunts and trivia while Traitors lurk in disguise, subtly sabotaging their progress.
 With a virtual spotlight on participants each round, it is a battle of suspicion, strategy and logic to decide who survives and who gets unmasked.
short_description: A thrilling deception game where Faithfuls tackle tech challenges while hidden Traitors sabotage, sparking suspense, strategy, and survival.
tagline: Yaha trust is rare, but dhokha everywhere

name: Smooth Operator
description: Smooth Operator is a Formula 1- themed K-12 workshop where 8-10 member pit crews tackle challenges at high-speed pit stops. From unstable fuels to overheating coolant and tyre grip loss, teams do hands-on experiments during the Grand Prix . Time constraints adds excitement, blending engineering skill with the adrenaline of racing.
short_description: Smooth Operator is Formula 1- themed workshop where pit crews tackle challenges and solve problem faced by their favourite racer in the Grand Prix!
tagline: Finishing fast is not always bad.

name: Yellow Tape 4.0
description: Step into the role of a detective in Yelllow Tape, a thrilling crime solving challenge. Examine clues, interrogate witnesses and unravel deception with your team to crack the case before time runs out!
short_description: Murder mystery based event where participants solve crimes by solving clues and interrogating suspects in a given time limit.
tagline: Everyone's a suspect. No one's safe

name: Aerodominator 11.0
description: Part of Gravitas 2025, Aerodominator brings top teams from across India (and beyond) to design, build & fly radio-controlled aircraft under real-world constraints. Aerodominator offers a platform to learn, interact and test your Aircraft Engineering Skills. The mission statement is to deploy an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) that will be launched from a designated takeoff zone and accurately drop payload (water) mid-air into a targeted payload drop zone of dimension 10m x 10m in minimum time without major damages to the airframe, serving as a rapid-response aid in fire-affected areas to support firefighting and disaster relief efforts
short_description: Aerodominator challenges top teams from across India and beyond to design, build, and fly radio-controlled aircraft under real-world constraints.
tagline: Design, Build, Dominate.

name: Dexter's Laboratory
description: A murder mystery and scavenger hunt that does not confine participants to a path or ploy. Search for the murderer, the maniacal scheme that is unravelled in four hours of a thrilling bout. Experiment with the clues available to discover ways that were beyond the realm of even Dexter himself. But remember this....the clock doesn't stop, why should the scheme?
short_description: Be riddled or be ravelled forever; Because everybody loves a good villain, but the thrill is what defines a memory.
tagline: It's a shame you can only die once.

name: Forensic Minds
description: Forensic Minds is an immersive hands-on murder mystery workshop where participants become investigators, analyzing evidence with real forensic techniques like gel electrophoresis, blood typing, and more. Each experiment reveals vital clues, demanding logic, teamwork, and reasoning. Blending science with mystery, the workshop challenges participants to uncover motives, identify suspects, and solve the case in a thrilling race against time.
club: STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (SABEST)
short_description: Forensic Minds is a hands-on workshop where participants investigate murder mysteries using forensic science, solving cases through experiments, logic, and teamwork.
tagline: Trust the Science. Question everything else.

name: Fork & Conquer
description: Learn the essentials of Git and GitHub from creating repositories and branching to pull requests and collaboration. This workshop is designed for beginners and enthusiasts who want to master version control, contribute to projects, and boost their developer workflow.
short_description: Beginner-friendly Git & GitHub workshop to learn version control, branching, pull requests, and effective collaboration.
tagline: Because Copy-Pasting Code Isn't Version Control.

name: HP Dreams Unlocked
description: HP Dreams Unlocked, a nationwide initiative by HP India and IFP, empowers college students to pitch innovative ideas across Film, Music, Business, Design, Gaming, Tech, Social Impact, and Content Creation. Selected students receive mentorship from India’s leading icons and a platform to showcase transformative ideas. This on-ground activation connects directly with students, fostering creativity and driving meaningful participation.
short_description: HP Dreams Unlocked, by HP India and IFP, empowers students to pitch innovative ideas across eight domains, offering mentorship, prizes, and a platform to shine.
tagline: Dream it, Be it:  Mentorship from top industry experts awaits !

name: SENSORED X
description: SENSORED X is an electrifying 2-day overnight experience where curiosity meets creation!  On Day 1, dive into the world of sensors and microcontrollers—master breadboard wiring, circuit assembly, and component handling while working hands-on with 10 real components (yours to keep!). On Day 2, step into the Mystery Box Challenge —unbox hidden sensors, decode their purpose, design a prototype, and pitch your solution to claim the prize pool of ₹5000 ! More than just a workshop, SENSORED X is a journey of learning, building, and competing—an unforgettable celebration of innovation, teamwork, and the spirit of electronics. 🚀
short_description: A 2-day hands-on sensor workshop covering basics to prototype building, ending with a thrilling Mystery Box Challenge.
tagline: Think. Sense. Create – The Mystery Starts Here

name: TwinControl Studio
description: In today’s fast-paced tech world, mastering embedded simulation and rapid prototyping is crucial to stay ahead in IoT and Industry 4.0. Without these skills, innovation slows and opportunities vanish. Our workshop offers exclusive free access to Twinsimulate, empowering you with real-time microcontroller simulation and hands-on learning. Join us to unlock faster design, smarter debugging, and cutting-edge expertise your gateway to the future of embedded systems. Register now to lead tomorrow’s technology.
short_description: Workshop event on how to use TwinSimulate software
tagline: Smarter design, faster debugging

name: THE CARTER CONSPIRACY
description: Dr. Benjamin Carter, a renowned chemical researcher, is mysteriously found dead in his laboratory. Whispers suggest he was on the brink of synthesizing a volatile formula. Was it scientific failure—or calculated murder? Teams must decode cryptic clues across 8 campus sites, recover 5 critical components, and navigate Carter’s experimental escape lab to unravel the conspiracy and expose the culprit.
short_description: Dr. Carter’s dead. A conspiracy brews. Race across campus, crack clues, and escape the lab before time runs out.
tagline:
“8 Locations. 5 Components. 1 Killer.
 Will you escape with the truth… or become part of the silence?”

name: Euler's Quest
description: Euler’s Quest is a MathVerse challenge packed with exciting visual math events & puzzles. Test your skills in logic, geometry, problem-solving, and mathematical thinking through round-based games. Several puzzles will include visual elements to challenge your perception and reasoning. Some challenges will even integrate VR to bring a whole new dimension to the experience.
short_description: Euler’s Quest is a vibrant challenge of visual puzzles, strategy, and problem-solving, celebrating Euler’s legacy and ingenuity.
tagline: Decipher and Dominate — Where 'X' is found and sanity is lost.

name: Nexus Trials
description: Nexus Trials is an anime-themed escape room designed to integrate logical reasoning, teamwork, and problem-solving within an immersive environment while retaining the creative and dynamic spirit of anime culture. This event draws inspiration from a wide spectrum of anime worlds, incorporating thematic puzzles, narrative-driven challenges, and time-bound objectives.
short_description: Nexus Trials is an anime themed escape room where players solve puzzles, face challenges and work together to escape.
tagline: “Unlock the nexus, master the escape.”

name: MapQuest: The GIS Treasure Hunt
description: Get ready for The Ultimate GIS Treasure Hunt! Teams will begin with a short quiz to qualify, then race across the campus solving map-based clues, coordinates, and puzzles. The first team to crack all clues and reach the final treasure will be crowned the winner. Adventure, learning, and fun await!
short_description: Race through campus, solve GIS clues, and be the first team to uncover the ultimate treasure.
tagline: Hunt the Clues, Conquer the Campus.

name: Manufacture Your Dream: RC Cars Building and Racing
description: Join us for "Manufacture Your Dream: RC Car Building and Racing," where you'll build and race your own RC car. With tools, materials, and guidance provided, compete on a custom track for the fastest car award. Experience creativity, competition, and fun as you bring your ideas to life!
short_description: Unleash creativity—build, compete, and race your dream RC car. Conquer the track, win prizes, and fuel your passion
tagline: Build, race, and innovate—experience the thrill of manufacturing your dream RC car.

name: Code Cortex 2.0
description: An electrifying hackathon where innovation meets adrenaline! This high-energy event unites brilliant minds to tackle real-world challenges, unleash cutting-edge code, and build game-changing solutions.
short_description: The ultimate innovation race: Code, create, and conquer.
tagline: Ctrl+Alt+CodeCortex

name: CID-A-THON
description: Be the mind of a murderer. You're the criminal psychologist on a high-stakes case, and the crime scene is your only lead. The clock is ticking as you race to decipher cryptic clues, bizarre patterns, and hidden messages to build a psychological profile and unmask the killer. Do you have what it takes to solve the ultimate puzzle?
short_description: Criminal psychology escape room.
tagline: Is it psychotic or are you in too deep?

name: Novus Ordo
description: The Novus Ordo is a student-led forum bringing together bright minds to deliberate on the transformative role of Artificial Intelligence in shaping society, security, and the global economy. Over two days, participants will engage in specialized committees on human rights & safety, defense & security, and economic development, culminating in a Joint Plenary Session to shape a shared student vision for ethical, secure, and sustainable AI integration worldwide.
short_description: The Novus Ordo is a student-led forum bringing together bright minds to deliberate on the transformative role of Artificial Intelligence in shaping society, security, and the global economy. Over two days, participants will engage in specialized committees on human rights & safety, defense & security, and economic development, culminating in a Joint Plenary Session to shape a shared student vision for ethical, secure, and sustainable AI integration worldwide.
tagline: A Policython for Building the Foundations of a New Order

name: Capture The Flag 3.0
description: Capture The Flag 3.0 (CTF 3.0) is the third edition of IEEE ComSoc VIT's flagship team- based tech hunt that blends logical reasoning, real-time problem-solving, and campus-wide strategy.
short_description: Games type event.
tagline: Roam and Zone, Flags of Your Own?????

name: Bio Blunder
description: Bio Blunder is a one-day hackathon merging biotech and entrepreneurship. Teams pitch flawed products, identify and solve defects, then defend their solutions in a mock press conference against judges and rivals. The event challenges creativity, problem-solving, and communication under pressure.
short_description: Bio Blunder is a one-day biotech hackathon where teams pitch, fix flaws, and defend solutions, testing creativity and communication.
tagline: Hack it Backwards

name: Modelling Minds
description:
Modelling Minds is an overnight machine learning hackathon where participants (solo or in teams of up to 3) clean, preprocess, and build ML models on curated datasets. Models are evaluated on hidden test data based on multiple performance metrics.

Designed for both beginners and enthusiasts, this event tests real-world problem-solving, optimization under time pressure, and practical data intuition — all in a competitive yet fun environment! A special intro session will be conducted at the start to guide beginners through ML basics before they dive into the hackathon and compete for prizes.
short_description: Modelling Minds is a hands-on ML challenge where participants clean, preprocess, and build models using real-world datasets.
tagline: Analyze. Interpret. Unravel.

name: Just LEGO It
description: "Just LEGO it!" is a creativity-packed event where participants form teams and bring their imaginations to life using LEGO bricks. Across three exciting rounds, they’ll build, adapt, and innovate under fun challenges. From crafting buildings to transforming them with unique themes and finally tackling a surprise twist, this event tests creativity, problem-solving, and teamwork.
short_description: Participants will receive LEGO pieces and a theme, and they must build something creative that aligns with the given theme.
tagline: LEGO Your limits

name: Data Alchemy 3.0
description: A dynamic workshop where brilliant minds dive into data analysis and visualization, turning raw info into powerful insights. It’s a magnet for top talent ready to transform numbers into magic! From foundational concepts to advanced techniques, we’ll cover it all—hands-on, practical, and designed to take you from beginner to master.
short_description: A dynamic workshop where brilliant minds dive into data analysis and visualization, turning raw info into powerful insights. It’s a magnet for top talent ready to transform numbers into magic!
tagline: Code. Compile. Conquer

name: PlaceIt
description: PlaceIT is an inspiring Ideathon that fuels innovation in Web Development, Cybersecurity, AI/ML, and IoT. Participants receive expert guidance, explore problem statements, and collaborate to craft impactful solutions. With mentorship and evaluation, the event enhances technical knowledge, problem-solving, teamwork, and presentation skills. PlaceIT empowers students to transform ideas into reality, fostering creativity, curiosity, and innovation in a collaborative environment.
short_description: PlaceIT sparks innovation in Web, Cybersecurity, AI/ML, and IoT, fostering teamwork, creativity, and impactful idea transformation.
tagline: From sparks of creativity to solutions that inspire change, innovation starts here

name: Switchuation 2.0
description: Switchuation 2.0 is a unique WebDev hackathon with a twist—teams swap project ideas at the start and build someone else’s vision. Blending web development with AI, it’s a fast-paced challenge of adaptability, creativity, and teamwork. Embrace new perspectives, think on your feet, and turn unfamiliar concepts into extraordinary creations. Step up, switch gears, and innovate.
short_description: Switchuation 2.0 is a WebDev hackathon where teams swap ideas, embracing AI, creativity, and collaboration to build innovative projects.
tagline: One Team's start is another's finale .SWITCH, SHUFFLE AND SLAYYY

name: Eau la la
description: Ever imagined a fragrance that’s uniquely you? Step into Eau la la, where science sparks creativity and play meets perfume! Win fragrance notes through fun, interactive games, craft your own signature scent, and give it its own name, tagline, and story. Fresh, exciting, and unforgettable—you don’t just walk away with a perfume, you walk away with a memory bottled by you.
short_description: Unlock, mix, create! Earn fragrance notes, blend your personalized perfume, give it a name & tagline, and make it yours.
tagline: Your notes. Your blend. Your perfume.

name: DESIGNFORGE 2.0
description:
DESIGNFORGE 2.0 is a premier structural engineering program designed for civil and structural engineering enthusiasts. It unfolds in two phases:

Phase 1 – Workshop: Participants undergo intensive hands-on training in Autodesk Revit, learning interface navigation, advanced modeling, detailing, and project documentation through a guided mini-project.

Phase 2 – Design Challenge + Fun Twists: Teams work on a real-world structural design problem using Revit. Alongside technical modeling, they will face surprise “fun challenges” such as sudden design modifications, sabotage elements, and simulated crisis alerts (e.g., flood conditions). These dynamic tasks test participants’ adaptability, problem-solving, and teamwork under pressure.


This unique blend of structured learning, technical application, and creative unpredictability fosters innovation, professional growth, and collaboration, bridging academic knowledge with real-world industry practices.
short_description: DESIGNFORGE 2.0 is a two-phase event where participants first gain hands-on training in Autodesk Revit and then compete in a design challenge. Phase 2 adds excitement with surprise tasks such as sudden design changes, sabotage twists, and crisis simulations, pushing teams to showcase adaptability, creativity, and teamwork under pressure.
tagline: design.develop.dominate

name: CASHFLOW 4.0
description:
"Cashflow 4.0 – a thrilling financial simulation where you don’t just play a game, you live the life of an investor. Participants start with a virtual wallet and step into a world of incomes, expenses, assets, and liabilities, just like in real life. The goal? Build enough passive income to escape the rat race and race toward financial freedom.

But beware—it’s not a smooth ride. Along the way, you’ll face market swings, surprise windfalls, sudden raids, and even the risk of bankruptcy. One smart investment could multiply your wealth, while one wrong move could wipe you out. With every turn, you’ll trade, negotiate, and outwit rivals to stay ahead.

Cashflow 4.0 is more than a board game—it’s a high-speed battlefield of strategy, wit, and decision-making. Adapt to the chaos, manage your resources, and play your moves wisely, because in the end, only the most strategic mind will claim financial victory."
short_description: Cashflow 4.0 – Where money moves fast and fortunes flip! Invest, trade, and outsmart rivals as raids, bankruptcies, and market twists strike without warning. Escape the rat race—or get crushed in it.
tagline: Turn Dice into Dollars, Dreams into Destiny.

name: Cyclomania
description: Go beyond a simple race in Cyclomania, the ultimate team cycling showdown! Tackle three thrilling events: repair a cycle against the clock, race with water in a high-energy relay, and combine speed with accuracy in a precision time trial. This competition tests teamwork, strategy, and versatility, pushing teams to their limits to crown the true Cyclomania Champions.
short_description: Cyclomania is an adrenaline-fueled team cycling challenge testing repair, relay, and precision skills in three unique, reality-show style events.
tagline: Fix, flow, and go – only the fastest team steals the show.

name: ESCAPE.EXE II
description:
Escape.exe II, the thrilling sequel to last year’s hit escape room. This time, the mystery is deadlier, the puzzles tougher, and the story darker.
 Participants will enter a fully immersive darkened space divided into four suspense-filled zones, each packed with chilling clues, intricate puzzles, and hidden secrets. Every solved challenge brings players closer to unmasking the murderer before time runs out.
 Blending suspense, teamwork, and critical thinking, Escape.exe II offers a gripping experience that tests logic and collaboration while keeping participants on edge till the very end.
short_description: Escape.exe II: Darker, deadlier, tougher puzzles — solve mysteries, uncover secrets, and escape before time runs out!
tagline: When you’ve found the light, beware of the shadows it leaves behind.

name: Grooveathon
description:
A lively competition where teams create choreography in real time, combining creativity with technical skill.
Phase 1 (DAY 1): QR CODE SCAVENGER HUNT 
All teams, made up of 8 members, come together for a mini QR code hunt on the first day of the event. After finishing the hunt, teams will receive their theme and their technical challenge, which they must include in their choreography. 

Phase 2 (DAY 1): Theme Evaluation (Review 1) 
Judges will assess how well teams express the given theme and challenges in their performances. 

Phase 3 (DAY 1): The Prop Allotment 
Right after the first review, each team receives a prop they must creatively add to their existing routine. 

Phase 4 (DAY 2): Rhythm Lab 
Teams move into a focused rehearsal stage to refine movements, improve transitions, and strengthen coordination to make sure their performance reflects the essence of the theme. 

Phase 5 (DAY 2): Elimination Round (Review 2) 
Teams perform half of their routine, including the prop in their choreography. This is an elimination round. 

DAY 3- 
The Final Showcase: All finalists perform one last time (the entire set lasting between 2:30 and 3 minutes) for the judges, who will score them and crown the champion.
short_description: The competition kicks off with a QR Code Hunt, unveiling hidden themes and code snippets that inspire dynamic dance challenges. Teams incorporate surprise props, choreographic twists, and stunning effects, clashing in creative face-offs before showcasing their finest performances in a spectacular grand finale.
tagline: The ultimate Dance & Tech collision

name: GlowRide
description:
Get ready to experience the city like never before! Glow Ride 2025 is an enchanting night-time cyclothon that combines fitness, fun, and festivity into one unforgettable evening. As the sun sets and the streets come alive, join us for a dazzling ride under the stars, where every turn of the pedal will be lit with brilliance, energy, and excitement.

This unique event is designed to light up the night—literally! With cycles provided for participants, you won’t need to worry about bringing your own gear. Adorned with glowing lights and glitter, the ride will create a spectacular trail of luminescence, turning the road into a vibrant celebration of motion and color.

Whether you’re a cycling enthusiast, a fitness lover, or simply someone who enjoys unforgettable experiences, Glow Ride promises the perfect blend of adventure and atmosphere. Imagine cruising through the night breeze, surrounded by a sea of glowing bicycles, laughter, and cheers—a true festival on wheels!
short_description:
Glow Ride 2025 is a vibrant night-time cyclothon where fitness meets festivity. With cycles provided for participants, the event transforms the streets into a glowing trail of lights, glitter, and energy. Join us for an unforgettable evening ride under the stars and be part of a community celebration that blends health, fun, and radiance.
short event description
tagline: Shine through the night, ride into the light

name: NeuroHack
description:
Neuralzome, in collaboration with RoboVITics, is hosting a 24-hour AI & Robotics Hackathon at GraVITas ’25. Teams of two will compete in AI, robotics, and software development, solving a problem statement revealed at the start.Participation is restricted to 4th year students. Winners will receive cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Neuralzome.
Event is restricted only for final year B-Tech students
short_description: Neuralzome, in collaboration with RoboVITics, is hosting a 24-hour AI & Robotics Hackathon at GraVITas ’25. Teams of two will compete in AI, robotics, and software development, solving a problem statement revealed at the start.Participation is restricted to 4th year students. Winners will receive cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Neuralzome. Event is open only for final year B-Tech students
tagline: “Build Smarter, Hack Harder.

name: Hands on Electronics
description: A workshop on basics of electronics for high school students. The session will contain basic concepts related to electronics, such as, current, voltage, types of circuits, active and passive components etc. We will also showcase some of the projects created by us such as a hand gesture controlled bot, an ultrasonic sensor based radar and some other stuff. We will also demonstrate a circuit using a breadboard to demonstrate the significance and applications of components like resistors, capacitors, LEDs, buttons etc. The session also reinforces electrical safety, systematic troubleshooting, and basic design thinking.
short_description: This workshop teaches high school students the basics of electronics. It covers key concepts like current and voltage, demonstrates projects such as a gesture-controlled bot and an ultrasonic radar, and includes a hands-on breadboard circuit demonstration. The session also emphasizes electrical safety, troubleshooting, and design thinking.
tagline: Unleash your potential and build the future with practical, hands-on electronic projects

name: FPGA Prototyping Summit
description: The FPGA Prototyping Summit is a hands-on workshop guiding students through Verilog-based RTL design and FPGA implementation. Covering the full FPGA design flow—from simulation to hardware deployment—it bridges academic theory with industry practices, preparing participants for careers in VLSI, embedded systems, and semiconductors through interactive sessions, demos, and guided coding exercises.
short_description: Hands-on workshop on Verilog-based RTL design and FPGA prototyping for careers in VLSI and embedded systems.
tagline: Designing the future, one bit at a time.

name: Mascot Baton
description: The Mascot Baton is a creative relay where participants take turns adding their unique touch to a shared mascot design. Open to all skill levels, it’s about collaboration, spontaneity, and fun rather than perfection. By the end, a one-of-a-kind mascot emerges, reflecting the imagination, diversity, and teamwork of everyone involved, making the experience inclusive and memorable.
short_description: Mascot Baton is a fun, collaborative art relay where participants build a unique mascot together, celebrating creativity, teamwork, and imagination.
tagline: Unleash your imagination, pass the baton, and create a mascot together!

name: Code Beyond Borders
description: The 48-Hour Cross-Country AR/VR Hackathon at Gravitas 2025 brings together diverse, cross-cultural teams from different countries to design immersive solutions in education, healthcare, sustainability, and collaboration. Over two days, participants engage in problem-solving, workshops, ideation, trivia, prototyping, and a final pitch, creating impactful AR/VR innovations while showcasing creativity, teamwork, and real-world problem-solving skills.
short_description: Code Beyond Borders unites global talent in a 48-hour hackathon, fostering cross-cultural collaboration to create impactful, boundary-breaking AR/VR innovations.
tagline: 48 Hours. Infinite Realities. One Immersive Future.

name: Hack N Seek
description: Hack n Seek is a thrilling treasure hunt where students crack codes, solve puzzles, and explore boundaries for hidden clues. Combining encryption, logic, and adventure, this challenge tests teamwork, speed, and problem-solving as participants race against time to uncover secrets and claim victory.
short_description: Hack n Seek challenges students to crack codes, solve puzzles, and race across boundaries for hidden clues.
tagline: Crack the Code. Chase the Clues. Conquer the Hunt.

name: Echos in Order
description: Echos in Order is a clue-hunt where every audio and video clip hides patterns, anomalies, and secret hints. Players must decode rhythms, spot visual cues, and connect scattered fragments to unlock the next stage. Only those who can truly "hear" and "see" beyond the obvious will reach the final revelation.Echos in Order is a multi-sensory clue-hunt using audio-visual puzzles, testing analytical, perceptual, and collaborative problem-solving skills.
short_description: Echos in Order is a multi-sensory clue hunt using audio and visual puzzles, testing analytical, perceptual, and collaborative problem solving skills.
tagline: Hear the unseen, see the unheard.

name: DevJams
description:
DevJams is a high-energy, 48-hour hackathon where innovators, problem-solvers, and tech enthusiasts come together to turn bold ideas into impactful solutions. Open to both beginners and seasoned developers, the event is designed to challenge creativity, sharpen technical skills, and foster collaboration.

Over the past seven editions, DevJams has evolved into a landmark event for the GDSC community, drawing participants from across the country. This September, the 8th edition will once again provide a space where diverse minds converge, building projects that push boundaries, solve real problems, and inspire the next wave of innovation.
short_description: DevJams is a 48-hour hackathon where beginners and pros come together to build bold, impactful solutions. Now in its 8th edition, it’s a landmark GDSC event that sparks creativity, collaboration, and real-world innovation. Checkout the Website at  [DevJams'25](https://devjams.dscvit.com?utm_source=Gravitas&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=Event_Description)
tagline: Wham Bam, Let’s DevJam!

name: Celestial Dive 4.0
description: Celestial Dive 4.0 is VIT-Stellar's annual overnight stargazing event, held as part of Gravitas in collaboration with Space India. Hosted at KC Lawn, the event features live celestial observations through professional telescopes, guided workshops on astronomy and telescope handling, and interactive discussions on space science. It offers participants a hands-on opportunity to explore planets, nebulae, and star clusters while deepening their understanding of the night sky.
short_description: Celestial Dive 4.0 invites astronomy enthusiasts for an unforgettable overnight experience under the stars. Witness the wonders of the night sky through powerful telescopes, accompanied by engaging educational talks that explore celestial mysteries and ignite cosmic curiosity.
tagline: Zooming into the cosmos to witness the wonders of stars, planets, and galaxies.

name: The Big Brand Theory
description: Big Brand Theory 2.0 is a team-based overnight ideathon where creativity meets brand building and marketing strategy. Through the night, participants will craft solutions across sectors, build strong brand identities, and create web-based prototypes. Unexpected challenges will test adaptability, ending with a Shark Tank–style round where investors allocate virtual capital. Build. Brand. Adapt. Can your team handle it
short_description: Big Brand Theory 2.0: An overnight ideathon where teams innovate, build brands, face challenges, and craft powerful marketing-driven solutions.
tagline: Ideas ignite, code transforms, brands conquer—make your mark

name: M.L. USING MATLAB 3.0
description: Get ready to level up your ML journey at Gravitas! This hands-on workshop introduces you to machine learning through MATLAB’s powerful tools. Work with real-world datasets, build and train models, and see how ML transforms domains like AI, healthcare, automation, and more.
short_description: A workshop to learn machine learning concepts using matlab.
tagline: MATLAB in Action: Turning Data into Discovery.

name: Trust issues
description: Trust Issues is a survival-style quiz-meets-engineering challenge where knowledge, speed, and betrayal collide. Round one features a rapid-fire buzzer quiz on common knowledge and basic engineering. Eliminated players regroup as rivals in round two—hands-on, time-bound chemical experiments testing precision and problem-solving. Retained teammates boost scoring chances, making adaptability the ultimate key to victory.
short_description: Trust Issues blends quizzes, betrayal, and chemical experiments—testing knowledge, adaptability, and teamwork under pressure for ultimate survival.
tagline: “Do you trust your friends … enough to survive Trust Issues?”

name: TEA TALK
description:
When curiosity meets experience and questions spark revelations.

Join Striver, ex-Google engineer, entrepreneur building his own company, India’s top coding mentor with 1.5M+ followers, and renowned for placement-focused talks, the Vice President of AI and Data at Capgemini, and many more industry experts in a podcast-style conversation exploring the current job market, growth mindset, and entrepreneurship.

Real insights. Unfiltered perspectives. Open doubt-solving.
short_description: TEA Talk brings VIT students inspiring sessions with YouTubers, founders, and industry leaders.
tagline: Brew Ideas. Spill Stories

name: Laser Room
description: Cross the Laser Room by dodging glowing beams and racing against time! Each participant must make it from one side to the other with a maximum of 3 laser touches allowed. Precision, agility, and speed decide your success—can you escape without getting caught?
short_description: “Cross the laser-filled room, dodge beams, and reach the other side without exceeding three touches.”
tagline: “Dodge the beams, race the clock, and escape the Laser Room Challenge!”

name: Voices Unplugged
description: “Voices Unplugged,” organized by the VIT Anchoring Club, is a three-hour interactive workshop introducing school students to the art of public speaking. Guided by experienced mentors, participants will explore voice modulation, body language, confidence-building, and storytelling through engaging games, exercises, and challenges. Designed to break stage fear, the workshop nurtures leadership, communication skills, and confidence for future opportunities.
short_description: A community-driven workshop inviting kids from a school to learn public speaking basics through fun, interactive sessions.
tagline: Teaching Words, Inspiring Worlds

name: Capture The CUBE
description: Step into the world of cybersecurity with our Capture the Flag competition. Tackle real-world inspired challenges in web, crypto, forensics, and more. Compete with fellow students, sharpen your problem-solving skills, and prove your talent in the digital battlefield. The flags are hidden, the clock is ticking — are you ready to capture them?
short_description: Test your hacking skills, solve challenges, and race against peers to capture the ultimate cyber flags.
tagline: Flags don’t capture themselves — someone’s gotta Hack, Crack, and cla!m the gl0ry.

name: What the Flag
description: This isn’t for you if you want hints or anything easy. WTF is IEEE-CS VIT’s high stakes technical Capture the Flag event for those who uncover vulnerabilities, outsmart systems, and think differently. Handcrafted challenges hide subtle flaws and clues across the internet. Every flag is concealed in plain sight or buried deep. Think fast. Dig deep. Chase the flag.
short_description: WTF is a technical CTF event. Tackle web exploits, digital forensics, reverse engineering, and cybersecurity challenges to capture hidden flags.
tagline: Nothing is random if you know where to look.

name: AsanaVision Hackathon
description: A 24 hour hackathon where participants create AI powered yoga pose detection solutions with real time feedback gamification and health insights to promote yoga wellness and fitness while showcasing final demos
short_description: Hackathon combining AI and yoga through pose detection technology and wellness innovation
tagline: Code, Pose and Innovate

name: SAE Drone Racing League
description: The Drone Racing League (DRL) event at our college technical fest is designed to deliver a thrilling combination of speed, precision, and innovation, conducted strictly under the MultiGP international standards and rules. The races will take place on standardized MultiGP tracks, specially designed with gates, flags, and technical obstacles to replicate real-world competitive drone racing conditions. These tracks feature a mix of sharp turns, slalom paths, vertical elements, and high-speed straights, challenging pilots to demonstrate mastery over agility, control, and split-second decision-making. All participating drones will be required to comply with MultiGP class specifications regarding size, weight, batteries, and video transmission systems, ensuring a fair and uniform platform for all competitors. To maintain safety and professionalism, the event will include strict pre-race inspections, pilot briefings, and real-time monitoring by referees and race marshals. The competition format will progress from multiple timed heats to semifinals and a grand finale, with automated lap timing systems ensuring precise and transparent results. Separate categories may also be introduced for novice and advanced pilots, allowing enthusiasts of all experience levels to participate and learn within a structured environment.
short_description: A Racing Competition for FPV Drone pilots at the professional as well as amateur (college teams) level. The Pilots will have to fly their drones across the designated track, which will be built at the event venue.
tagline: Turning Air into Asphalt

name: The Grand GraVITas Quiz
description: DBQC - The VIT Quiz Club, brings you the ultimate quizzing event of graVITas ‘25, Grand GraVITas Quiz. This flagship Sci-Biz-Teach quiz, open to all students, who can participate in teams of two or as Lonewolves, consists of a Preliminary round and a Final rounds. Winners will be given cash prizes and certificates.
short_description: The Grand GraVITas Quiz is DBQC's premiere event. TGGQ is a Sci-Biz-Tech Quiz consisting of a preliminary round and finals.
tagline: VIT's Premiere Sci-Biz-Tech Quiz

name: DESYNC X VALORANT (TAG)
description: Step into the world of Valorant, where precision, strategy, and teamwork decide the champions. In this event, teams will face off in high-energy matches that test coordination, quick thinking, and adaptability. Every round is a new opportunity to outsmart your opponents, showcase your skills, and work together for the win. With unique agent abilities, dynamic maps, and fast-paced objectives, Valorant offers the perfect stage for intense competition. Gather your squad, plan your plays, and aim for the top — the title awaits the best team.
short_description: Teams battle in high-energy matches that test skill, adaptability, and coordination. With unique agents and dynamic maps, every round is a chance to outsmart opponents and claim the title.
tagline: Enter the Glitch. Embrace the Chaos

name: Aero-Vision
description: Join us for a one-day intensive workshop on aero-modelling software, where you'll learn to design, analyze, and simulate using tools like XFLR8 and Fusion 360. Gain hands-on experience in creating CAD models, running aerodynamic simulationS and understanding design principles. Perfect for beginners and enthusiasts, this event equips you with practical skills to bring your aero-modelling ideas to life.
short_description: A one-day workshop on XFLR8 and Fusion 360--learn CAD modeling,aerodynamic simulations, and aero-modelling basics through hands-on training.
tagline: Dream. Design. Deploy.

name: HackX 3.0
description:
Join us for a 36-hour hackathon on AI, ML, and signal processing on September 27–28, 2025. Tackle real-world challenges from healthcare to music while showcasing your unique "X factor."

Participants get a chance to:

Internship opportunities with SkillPact under CEEC Global Ventures

Exciting gift hampers

Expert sessions on cracking the job market and resume building


Open to all branches and all years—whether you’re a fresher or a final-year student, if you’re passionate about AI/ML or signals, this is your stage.

👉 Register now and unleash your potential!
short_description: HackX 3.0, the flagship event of IEEE SPS, is an overnight hackathon uniting AI/ML and Signal Processing with expert guidance, collaboration, and innovation at its core.
tagline: Code hard, Think smart and Make your mark

name: Step Up Stars
description:
The Dance Workshop is an exclusive opportunity for students of Grades 6–12 to experience dance in a vibrant setting. 

In this workshop, students will:

Learn a new freestyle choreography blending multiple dance styles( 7 different teams housed by the VIT dance club), set to age-appropriate music.
Be guided by professional and experienced choreographers in a beginner-friendly format, and volunteers who will be present throughout the session for appropriate guidance and teaching. 
Participate in a 2 hour session that includes short interactive games to create a fun, engaging, and collaborative environment.

The workshop is designed not only to teach dance but also to encourage creativity, confidence, and an enjoyable learning experience within the energetic atmosphere of GraVITas.
short_description: A 2-hour beginner-friendly dance workshop for students of Grades 6–12 during GraVITas. Participants will learn freestyle choreography on trendy, age-appropriate songs through interactive and engaging sessions conducted by trained choreographers.
tagline: Where every step makes u shine

name: EnerVision
description: Ready to engineer the future of energy? In this overnight hackathon, innovators shall join forces to push loT technology to its limits. Build smart sensor-powered solutions, craft intelligent algorithms, and solve urgent energy challenges head-on. With expert reviews shaping every stage, your idea could emerge as the blueprint for how the world powers tomorrow.
short_description: An overnight hackathon where innovators harness IoT, smart sensors, and intelligent algorithms to create cutting-edge solutions for urgent energy challenges.
tagline: Smart power, Reinvented

name: DrugNOVA
description: DrugNOVA is a two-day competition simulating the entire drug development pipeline, from discovery to FDA approval. Teams design candidate molecules using docking and ADME tools, then navigate regulatory challenges, production hurdles, and strategy building. Finalists pitch before a mock FDA board, combining scientific reasoning, innovation, and communication to experience biotech’s real-world complexities in a hands-on, immersive format.
short_description: DrugNOVA challenges biotech enthusiasts to design, dock, and pitch drug discoveries, simulating FDA approval with innovation and strategy.
tagline: Design. Dock. Deliver.

name: Machine Design with Fusion 360
description: The Machine Design workshop is a hands-on, 2-day Workshop focused on mastering Autodesk Fusion 360 for designing mechanical components and assemblies. Participants will learn essential skills including sketching techniques, 3D CAD modeling, joints and assembly. The workshop will also cover rendering for realistic visual presentations, real-time simulation using PyBullet for physics-based motion and interaction testing, stress analysis, and animation to demonstrate mechanical movements.
short_description: A 24 hour workshop focused on Teaching Fusion360 and real time simulation.
tagline: Design, Simulate, Create

name: Colours of INDIA
description: This event fuses traditional painting with digital design. Participants begin by creating hand-painted artwork, then scan or photograph it for digital enhancement using Canva, Figma, or Photoshop. A guided workshop will teach essential tools and techniques. The final mixed-media masterpiece will be judged on creativity, originality, balance, and impact—celebrating art that blends brush strokes with pixels seamlessly.
short_description: Create a painting, enhance it digitally after a quick workshop, and showcase your creativity in this exciting mixed-media art challenge.
tagline: From Brush to Pixels Redefining Creativity.

name: Hackademia - College Survival Edition
description: Hackademia – College Survival Edition is a student-focused hackathon where participants create clever, minimal yet impactful solutions for real campus-life struggles. With the theme “Less is More,” projects should be creative, practical, and relevant to student life — from mess menu predictions to clash-free timetables. Judging emphasizes creativity, usability, justified tech choices, and minimal but effective implementation.
short_description: Hackademia – College Survival Edition challenges students to build minimal, clever tech solutions for real campus struggles, judged on creativity and usability.
tagline: Less is More: innovate student life, one hack at a time

name: Echoes of the extinct
description: Form a team of 3–5 and battle through an arcade of Jurassic challenges—from mind-bending puzzles to adrenaline-packed mini-games, with surprise auctions that flip the game on its head.
short_description:
A dinosaur has escaped !!
 Teams must investigate evidence, identify which dinosaur has escaped,and strategize how to capture it.
tagline: A Jurassic Saga

name: Best Manager
description: Best Manager is a solo competition designed to test participants’ strategic thinking, problem-solving, management, and presentation skills. Through challenging scenarios and real-time decision-making, participants showcase their ability to think critically, manage resources, and lead effectively. Only the sharpest minds will prove themselves as the ultimate “Best Manager.”
short_description: Best Manager challenges individuals to showcase strategic thinking, problem-solving, management, and presentation skills through real-world scenarios.
tagline: Conquer the Unconquered

name: Frame it with Figma
description: "Join this hands-on workshop, open to everyone with no prior design experience! In Session 1, learn Figma to create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes with real-time collaboration. In Session 2, apply your skills to design a full UI for a web or mobile app. Win exciting cash prizes and earn a certificate of participation!"
short_description: "Hands-on Figma workshop: learn wireframes, mockups, prototypes, then design a complete UI. Win cash prizes, certificates for all."
tagline: Design your vision

name: Aerovate 2.0
description: Aerovate 2.0 is VIT-Stellar's two-day rocketry event, conducted in collaboration with Thrust Tech India. Day 1 features an intensive workshop on rocketry fundamentals, including simulations, design principles, and hands-on construction of prototype rockets by participating teams. On Day 2, teams will launch their rockets at SJT Ground, testing their designs and applying the concepts learned. The event aims to provide a practical, engaging introduction to aerospace engineering and experimental rocketry
short_description: Aerovate 2.0 is a 2-day rocketry event by VIT-Stellar & Thrust Tech India, featuring a workshop on rocketry fundamentals & hands-on prototype building on Day 1, followed by rocket launches on Day 2.
tagline: Sky’s not the limit-it’s just the parking lot.

name: Brand Bazar
description: Brand Bazar is a dynamic marketing management event that immerses teams in strategic challenges and interactive experiences. It cultivates brand-building expertise, strategic thinking, leadership, customer engagement, and swift decision-making skills. By integrating core business principles with marketing practice, the event equips participants with practical insights and essential competencies to excel in today’s competitive business and management environment.
short_description: Brand Bazar offers immersive marketing challenges to develop strategic, leadership, and brand-building skills for aspiring business leaders.
tagline: Conquer the Unconquered

name: Code2Create 6.0 (C2C)
description: One of VIT’s oldest legacy hackathons, Code2Create is a flagship 48-hour event where creativity meets skill. With diverse tracks, C2C unites participants to solve real-world challenges, collaborate with peers, and learn from mentors. It’s the stage for innovation and talent, welcoming both beginners and seasoned hackers to build, showcase, and shine at the ultimate hackathon experience.
short_description: Code2Create 6.0, the grandest hack at VIT, unites innovators to build, learn, and transform bold ideas into reality.
tagline: Don’t just code for the vibes, Code2Create.

name: ELECTRA
description: IEEE-EDS Electra Mini Colloquium provides a unique opportunity to explore breakthroughs in electron devices. With distinguished speakers, technical insights, and interactive sessions, the event connects students, researchers, and industry professionals, creating a vibrant space for learning, networking, and advancing knowledge in semiconductor and electronic device technologies.
short_description: A premier IEEE-EDS event fostering knowledge exchange, collaboration, and insights into emerging trends and technologies in electron devices.
tagline: Connecting minds and shaping the future of electronics through research and innovation.

name: Dragons, Dice & Destiny
description:
An epic quest where legends are written anew and destinies are as scattered as the stars. Will you rise a hero or fall into oblivion?
 
 Join us for an unforgettable Dungeons & Dragons campaign, where every roll of the dice weaves a new chapter. The adventure is yours to create—are you ready to answer the call?
short_description: A table-top game of wits and roleplay where every roll marks your fate. Ready for the adventure? Join us now!!
tagline: Survive the dragon, live the tale, and let the die decide.

name: SOLVE YOUR BRAIN
description: In this interactive EEG demonstration, participants wear EEG bands that project their brainwaves live while solving puzzles like the Rubik’s Cube. The audience experiences both the challenge and the fascinating brain activity behind it, blending science with excitement. At the end, each participant receives a personalized brainwave report, making the event insightful, engaging, and unforgettable.
short_description: Participants wear EEG bands, solve puzzles, display brainwaves live, engage audience, and receive personalized brainwave activity reports after challenges
tagline: Where Mind Meets Motion

name: HONEST HACKERZ
description:
•Mobile Platform Attack vectors, Hacking Mobile Platforms, Hacking Android OS - FATRAT with ngrok, AndroRAT tools
•Wireless Hacking Methodology, Hacking Wireless Networks, Countermeasures - Aircrack-ng, Wifite, Kismet tools (Deauthentication attacks, MITM attacks)
•IoT Threats, IoT Hacking Methodology - killerbee, HomePwn tools
•Cloud Computing Attacks, Cloud Security - Prowler tool
•Web application Pen test - ZAP tool
•CamPhish; Password Cracking tools and techniques; Intrusion Detection System tools
short_description: ETHICAL HACKING METHODOLOGIES THROUGH KALI LINUX
tagline: NA

name: CodeRush 3.0
description: CodeRush 3.0 is the flagship competitive coding event of IEEE TEMS at graVITas’25, featuring a unique relay-race style coding challenge. Teams of three participants will take turns coding, with each member continuing from where the previous teammate left off. The event is conducted under a strict time limit, testing participants’ coding skills, problem-solving ability, and teamwork under pressure.
club: IEEE - TECHNOLOGY AND ENGINEERING MANAGEMENT SOCIETY ( IEEE-TEMS)
short_description: CodeRush 3.0 challenges teams of three in a thrilling relay-style coding race, testing logic, speed, strategy, and teamwork under pressure.
tagline: Relay your logic, race the clock, and rise as coding champions

name: The Treasure Trail
description: Embark on a thrilling treasure hunt! Solve clever riddles and tackle challenges with your team to unlock the hidden prize. This is a high-stakes race where quick thinking and teamwork are your greatest assets. Gather your friends, outwit the competition, and claim the ultimate treasure. The adventure awaits!
short_description: A secret prize lies hidden. Can you and your team solve the clues and outsmart the competition? The adventure begins now. The treasure is yours for the taking.
tagline: Solve it, Sprint it, Snatch it

name: DESYNC X FIFA (TAG)
description: Participants will compete in an exciting FC 25 tournament played in knockout style. Players face off in head-to-head matches, showcasing their gaming skills and football strategies. Winners advance through each round until the final, where the ultimate champion is crowned. The event promises fun, competition, and thrilling virtual football action.
short_description: thrilling FIFA tournament where gamers compete head-to-head for glory, prizes, and ultimate bragging rights
tagline: Enter the Glitch. Embrace the Chaos

name: 404 Fun Found
description: Forget typical hackathons - this is a high-energy, multi-round showdown where coding is only part of the game. Expect puzzles, trivia, logic challenges and quirky twists that test speed, creativity, strategy and teamwork. Each round pushes you beyond limits with surprises that keep you guessing. Gather your team and dive into the ultimate blend of skill, wit and fun!
club: THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHNOLOGY (IET)
short_description: A fast-paced multi-round challenge mixing puzzles, trivia, coding and teamwork - race against time, think creatively and outsmart surprises
tagline: Crack the Clues, Catch the Fun

name: Celestia
description: Celestia is a 24-hour beginner-friendly vibe coding hackathon where AI tools power creativity and innovation. Working in teams, participants will brainstorm, design, and prototype solutions across six tracks—Dev Tools, Open Innovation, SDG, Hardware, EdTech, and Healthcare. The event offers an exciting chance to gain new skills and transform ideas into impactful, real-world solutions.
short_description: Celestia is a 24-hour beginner-friendly vibe coding hackathon spanning six tracks, where participants collaborate, innovate, and pitch impactful ideas.
tagline: Shaping a smarter tomorrow through code, collaboration, and innovation at Celestia.

name: PCBify
description:
Are you curious about how electronic devices are built, or how complex circuits come to life on compact green boards? 
Here’s your chance to explore the fascinating world of Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs) through an immersive, beginner-friendly workshop.

Over the span of two days, participants will gain both theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience in PCB design. 
Starting from the fundamentals of electronic circuits and schematic design, the workshop will guide students through design software tools, component placement, routing techniques, and industry standards. By the end of the workshop, attendees will have designed their very own PCB, bridging the gap between conceptual circuits and real-world applications.
short_description:
A two-day beginner-friendly workshop introducing the world of Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs). 
Participants will learn the basics of electronic circuits, 
schematic design, component placement, and routing using design software. By the end, they will create their own PCB, gaining both theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience.
tagline: Beginner-friendly workshop to learn PCB design basics and create your own circuit board in two days.

name: SURVIVAL SHOWDOWN - The Stranger Things version
description: The Competitive Escape Room – a pulse-pounding event packed with mind-bending puzzles and challenges that push your problem-solving and teamwork skills to the limit. It’s an immersive, high-stakes experience where logic meets adrenaline!
short_description: A themed Competitive Escape Room – with brain-teasing puzzles and teamwork. Get ready for an adrenaline fueled event!
tagline: Escape the upside down before it escapes you

name: Embed Control 6.0
description: Embed Control 6.0, the flagship event of IEEE CAS, returns this year with an exciting twist – a hardware hackathon to complement its hands-on workshop. Day one will be an industry expert-guided workshop on the ESP32 development board, and day two is where students will team up and test their knowledge in a hardware hackathon on embedded systems.
short_description: Embed Control 6.0 is an ESP32 workshop and hardware hackathon for students to learn, build, and compete in embedded systems
tagline: Embed, Lead, Innovate

name: Trial of the shadow sovereign
description: Inspired by the hit anime solo leveling, this event takes players through challenges and missions that they much complete throughout the day, with various difficulties and interesting puzzles. Each mission earns them experience points and increases their level, as well as gives them abilities to use in the final battle. The points and skills vary based on difficulty of the mission. Towards the climax of the event, players will gather together to face the ultimate trial and arise among the rest to become the next shadow sovereign.
short_description: Players advance forward by completing missions and increasing their levels, and compete against each other in the ultimate trial.
tagline: "rise through trials, ascend as a sovereign"

name: Hackovation 2.0
description: Hackovation 2.0 is a dynamic 36-hour hackathon crafted to inspire participants to design impactful solutions addressing real-world challenges. Teams will collaborate intensively across diverse domains such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Internet of Things, Sustainability, Automation, Fintech, Healthcare, Cybersecurity, and beyond. The event strives to cultivate innovation, technical mastery, and collective problem-solving.
short_description: Hackovation 2.0 is a 36-hour hackathon bringing together creative minds to innovate, collaborate, and build impactful solutions for real-world challenges.
tagline: Sail the seas of Innovation

name: CivilHunt 2.0
description: CivilHunt 2.0 is a team event where students solve campus-based riddles, puzzles, and challenges that represent steps in building a virtual dam. After each task, teams spin a digital Dam Wheel for surprises—either boosts or setbacks. With coordinators tracking progress, the team earning the most dam progress after all tasks wins. Teamwork, strategy, and campus spirit unite.
short_description: CivilHunt2.0 is about solving series of tasks, building a metaphorical dam experiencing ups&downs simulating a construction project.
tagline: Let the Hunt Begin

name: SAE Go Karting
description: Go Karting brings high-speed excitement to campus, giving you the chance to test your driving skills or pick them up on the go! Our specially designed race track will challenge your reflexes, control, and speed as you take on sharp turns and straight-line sprints. Race head-to-head with friends, feel the adrenaline build with every lap, and push your limits to see who claims victory. Whether you’re chasing the thrill of competition or simply want to experience racing for the first time, this is your moment to throttle up and own the track!
short_description: Feel the rush of Go Karting on campus—sharp turns, fast sprints, pure adrenaline! Race your friends and own the track.
tagline: Floor the pedal and drive your heart out in an adrenaline-filled GoKarting experience.

name: LIGHTS OUT
description: Lights Out is a high-octane, bio-inspired motorsport challenge blending Formula 1 with nature’s genius. Teams tackle four thrilling stages—BioRevamp, Pitstop Gauntlet, BioAuction, and the Grand Prix Showdown—reimagining flawed F1 designs with biomimicry, surviving high-speed relays, gambling biocoins on upgrades, and unveiling bold, nature-powered race machines. Innovation, strategy, and adrenaline collide—when the lights go out, the game begins.
club: STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (SABEST)
short_description: Lights Out fuses Formula 1 with nature—biomimicry, strategy, and adrenaline drive teams through four thrilling, high-stakes stages.
tagline: REDESIGN. OPTIMISE. RACE.

name: Beat The Jammer
description: Beat the Jammer is a fast-paced, tech-inspired game where teams race to locate the strongest music signal while a jammer blasts noise to block it. Players rotate as hider, jammer, and seekers, using sharp listening and quick moves. Bonus puzzles and tricky twists like moving jammers or blindfolds make it a fun mix of sound hunt and strategy.
short_description: Beat the Jammer: A fun sound-hunt game of signals, noise, strategy, puzzles, and twists.
tagline: Outsmart the static, chase the sound.

name: The Silent Voice
description: Ready to turn your ideas into a real-world impact? Join our Ideathon on Sign Language & Innovation for a full day of creativity, learning, and hands-on problem-solving. This is your chance to shine and build something truly meaningful. The event will kick off with an introduction, followed by a special guest speaker who will guide you through the world of sign language and its importance, giving you the foundational knowledge you need for the challenge. Then, the main event begins! You’ll work in teams to choose a problem domain and create an impactful solution (hardware or software). The top three teams will be awarded prizes and certificates, and all other participants will receive a certificate of participation. Join us and be a part of the future where innovation knows no limits!
short_description: Get ready to make an impact! Join our Ideathon on Sign Language and Innovation for an exhilarating challenge that turns your ideas into reality. Compete for incredible prizes and build a solution that changes lives.
tagline: Where hands speak, heart listens

name: The Cube-Sat Workshop
description: Come to our two-day CubeSat workshop! You will use CAD to design a CubeSat in this workshop, then put the simplified functional satellite together and test it. Learn electronics, data analysis, and microcontroller programming. The best part is that you will bring home your CubeSat model, which combines space engineering, practical construction, and creativity to record actual data.
short_description: Build your own satellite! Design, program, and construct a working model during our two-day workshop. You'll even bring it home to gather real data.
tagline: Discovering Space, One Cube at a Time

name: CRISPRverse
description: CRISPRverse is a challenge-driven event where participants experience genome editing through competitive, hands-on tasks. Starting with guided workshops, teams design CRISPR strategies, tackle knockout vs. knock-in decisions, and simulate editing results. Advancing through rounds, they present complete pipelines to judges. By combining training, competition, and creativity, CRISPRverse offers an engaging platform to learn, apply, and showcase CRISPR innovation.
short_description: CRISPRverse is a competitive, hands-on event where teams design, simulate, and present CRISPR genome editing solutions from start to finish.
tagline: Rewrite Existence

name: Hack the Dash 2.0
description: Join our Power BI Workshop & Competition! Learn data visualization skills in our workshop and then compete to design interactive dashboards using real datasets. No coding experience needed. Form a team of 3-4 and work together to create innovative dashboards. Top teams win exciting prizes. Explore data analytics in a practical way and have fun. A perfect opportunity to learn and showcase your skills!
short_description: Join our Power BI Workshop & Competition! Learn data visualization fundamentals and showcase skills for exciting prizes and career growth!
tagline: Data Meets Creativity:Unlock Insights with Power BI

name: Ad-A-Thon 3.0
description: Ad-a-Thon, Gravitas’ flagship overnight ad challenge, tests wit, teamwork, and storytelling. Morning games decide your ad genre—horror, comedy, romance, thriller, or more. By night, create, shoot, and edit a full ad within hours. The top 3 most original and engaging entries win exciting prizes and the Gravitas spotlight!
short_description: Ad-a-Thorn: Gravitas’ overnight ad challenge—games set your genre, night fuels creation, top ads win spotlight!
tagline: Spin the Genre. Shoot the Madness

name: Bricks By Bid
description: Bricks by Bid is a strategic simulation where participants form teams with friends to collaboratively build and expand their infrastructure. The event features bidding-based auctions for raw materials and city assets, alongside resource trading and infrastructure development. It promotes teamwork, negotiation, and resource management skills in an engaging and competitive environment.
short_description: Bricks by Bid is a team-based simulation of bidding, trading, and building infrastructure, fostering strategy, negotiation, and resource management.
tagline: Trade Smart, Bid Bold, Build Big, Transform Ideas into Bricks.

name: Introduction to Linux
description:
Linux is everywhere, from the servers powering the internet to embedded systems running in everyday devices. Yet, many still see it as a “complex” or “intimidating” platform. This session aims to break that barrier.

Through this hands-on workshop, participants will be introduced to the fundamentals of Linux: the philosophy that drives it, the structure of the operating system, and the essential commands that give users complete control over their machines. We will explore the Linux filesystem, process management, permissions, package management, and shell scripting basics. Along the way, attendees will gain practical experience navigating the command line and learn how Linux empowers developers, engineers, and innovators across the world.

Whether you’re a beginner curious about Linux, a developer looking to strengthen your foundation, or someone interested in exploring open-source, this workshop will equip you with the tools and mindset to get started.

By the end of the session, you’ll walk away not just knowing what Linux is, but also how to use it effectively.
short_description: This hands-on session will introduce you to the Linux ecosystem, covering core commands, filesystem navigation, process management, and the open-source philosophy. Perfect for beginners and enthusiasts eager to explore the backbone of modern computing.
tagline: Live The Linux Way

name: Aero-Crafters
description: AeroCrafters is an engaging workshop where you’ll explore the fundamentals of airplanes and flight dynamics before building your own model plane with guidance from the skilled Asailing Falcons team. Gain valuable hands-on experience, deepen your understanding of aeronautics, and develop essential teamwork skills along the way. This is the perfect opportunity to combine learning with fun, as you work alongside passionate mentors and fellow enthusiasts. From understanding how planes take flight to watching your own creation soar. This workshop offers both knowledge and unforgettable memories in one exciting package!
short_description: Aero-Crafters is a 3-day workshop at graVITas where VIT students design, build, and fly model aircraft in teams, guided by SAE-VIT and Assailing Falcons
tagline: Take off into aeromodelling — a hands-on journey with SAE-VIT & Assailing Falcons.

name: Auction to Action 2.0
description: Auction to Action 2.0 is a dynamic event combining auctions with innovation. It features three rounds: General Auction, where teams bid on essential resources; Blind Auction, with mystery packages testing risk-taking; and Strategic Trade & Product Development, where teams trade, manage resources, and build prototypes. The event fosters creativity, strategy, negotiation, and teamwork, offering hands-on experience in resource management and problem-solving.
short_description: Auction to Action 2.0 is a unique event where teams compete through three auction-based rounds: bidding on resources, taking risks with mystery packages, and finally trading to build a product.
