It highlights creativity, adaptability, and teamwork, pushing participants to think strategically while working under pressure.
tagline: When Bids Become Betrayal, Action Becomes War

name: Byte to Bite
description:
BYTE TO BITE is a three-round event that brings together the worlds of artificial intelligence and culinary art. Participants will be challenged to think creatively and technically as they first code a smart system to generate a recipe and then cook that exact dish using real ingredients. 
 
 ROUND 1: AI MODELING
 small workshop to help the participants understand the steps to creating their own wrapper model, and an introduction to prompt engineering, as well as providing extra resources to help them
 ROUND 2: RECIPE RENDER 
 this round gives the participants time to create their own wrapper 
 ROUND 3: FROM SCRIPT TO SKILLET
 The participants would be provided with a mystery box with some random ingredients and using their made wrapper, they must generate a recipe which then has to be recreated by the participants
short_description: BYTE TO BITE is the ultimate tech-culinary challenge where code meets cuisine. Participants will be taught the basics of AI Wrappers and prompt engineering, and then Participants will have to build their own AI recipe generator, then use their custom model to create a unique dish from a mystery box of ingredients. It's a true test of skill, from script to skillet!
tagline: Cook What You Code

name: Career Expo (Internal)
description:
The Career Expo at graVITas’25 is your gateway to endless possibilities! 🚀
From cutting-edge tech innovations to dynamic non-tech career paths, this is where top companies and aspiring students meet. Discover opportunities, explore future skills, and gain real insights into the world of work. More than just an expo, it’s your chance to build connections, unlock potential, and step confidently into your future.
short_description: The Career Expo at graVITas’25 is your gateway to endless possibilities! 🚀 From cutting-edge tech innovations to dynamic non-tech career paths, this is where top companies and aspiring students meet. Discover opportunities, explore future skills, and gain real insights into the world of work. More than just an expo, it’s your chance to build connections, unlock potential, and step confidently into your future.
tagline: Step into your Future

name: Clueminati 3.0
description:
Every tale of survival begins with loss. A fellowship is torn apart - some dragged into Hell, others left on Earth, desperate to bring them back. The living hunt for clues, while the damned confronts cryptic trials, both inching toward a single truth: salvation is impossible without sacrifice.

A final trial awaits - one that will test wit, unity, and resolve. Only the strongest will rise from the flame; the rest will remain bound in darkness.

Do you have what it takes to bring your friends Back to Life?
short_description: Clueminati is back with its third edition and this time, the treasure hunt is full of secrets, twists, and surprises at every turn. Teams will be split, mysteries will unfold, and only the cleverest will escape unscathed. Will you uncover the mysteries, outsmart the trials, and rise victorious? Step in... if you dare.
tagline: Face The Flames, Revive or Remain.

name: Operation signal chase
description:
Operation Signal Chase
 Embark on an adrenaline-filled treasure hunt as a rescue communications team! Decode Morse code clues from your hidden “radio operator,” navigate landmarks, and race across campus to find them. Beware of decoys — speed and accuracy are key. The first team to locate and “rescue” their missing member wins the mission!
short_description:
Operation Signal Chase
 Decode Morse clues, race across campus, outsmart decoys, and rescue your missing teammate before others do!
tagline: "Crack the Code. Track the Signal. Rescue to Win!"

name: Cyberverse
description: Cyberverse is a 36-hour offline hackathon under VIT Vellore’s Gravitas, where students from diverse fields collaborate to build real-world tech products. Merging AI with cybersecurity, it challenges participants to think creatively and develop impactful solutions. Across three rounds being idea submission, prototyping, and final presentations, teams gain hands-on skills, mentorship, and recognition through prizes, celebrating innovation and collaboration.
short_description: Cyberverse is a thrilling 36-hour hackathon at VIT Vellore, where brilliant minds unite to create, innovate, and showcase groundbreaking solutions.
tagline: Hack the challenges. Defend your ideas. Disrupt the future. Welcome to Cyberverse.

name: Mojo Unchained
description: Step into the director’s chair and recreate your favorite movie scene in this ultimate showdown. Teams can remake any scene shot-for-shot or with creative twists—dubbed, lip-synced, DIY, or cinematic. Once the lights dim, every recreation hits the screen. Prizes await for Best Recreation, Props, Set, Dialogue, and more.
short_description: Recreate iconic movie scenes—shot-for-shot or with twists. Dub, lip-sync, DIY props. Compete for Best Recreation, Props, Set, Dialogue.
tagline: Lights, camera, freedom—the scene is yours.

name: SAE Grand Prix
description: SAE Grand Prix is an electrifying overnight event where you step in as the team principal of your own racing crew. From strategy to quick decision-making under pressure, every choice matters. Experience the thrill of a night race, build teamwork, and live the motorsport dream. Gather your crew, light up the track, and race into the night!
short_description: SAE Grand Prix is the event where you step in as the team principal of your own racing crew. From strategy to quick decision-making under pressure. Experience the thrill of a night race, build teamwork, and live the motorsport dream.
tagline: Light up the track, and race into the night!

name: Gamified 3.0
description: Gamified 3.0 is a hands-on workshop where you explore the fundamentals of electronics and microcontrollers by building your own game controller. From circuit design and coding to wired and wireless communication, every step is interactive and engaging. By the end, you’ll not only gain practical skills but also take home a fully functional controller you built yourself!
short_description: Dive into a hands-on workshop where you build your own game controller from scratch using microcontrollers. From circuits to wireless communication, code to debugging — every step is interactive and skill-packed. Walk away with a fully functional controller you created!
tagline: Your first step from gamer to maker

name: Escape Room
description: Trapped in a locked room with only your wits and teammates to rely on, participants must solve a series of mind-bending riddles, uncover hidden clues, and crack clever puzzles — all within a limited time. This thrilling escape room challenge tests your logic, teamwork, and presence of mind. Will you escape in time?
short_description: Race against time in an exciting escape room, solving riddles and puzzles with teamwork, logic, and sharp thinking to escape.
tagline: Every corner hides a clue, every riddle holds a secret, and every second slips away.
